points.name: Abydos Temple of Setos I. and Osirion
points.description:
NameAbydos Temple of Setos I. and Osirion
DescriptionIn the temple of Seti I. you find many illustrations of the Djed-pillar. What is a Djed-Pillar? There are many explanations from the official archeology. But, it seems to be something technological and definitely something important, because Isis, the highest goddess (Wife of Osiris) gives it as present to a pharaoh.
Behind the temple of Seti I. you find the Osireion. It was declared as oldest megalithic structure in Egypt.
The blocks weight up to 80 tons. Fitting all perfect together to a vault. The question here is: Why is the oldest building the best one, with the biggest stones – and why they later used much smaller blocks to construct the temples on it. Was there a forgotten technology? Because the evolution of technology stands upside down.
PlaceAbydos
CountryEgypt

points.name: Ancient Earthworks of Bezvodovka (Ukraine)
points.description:
NameAncient Earthworks of Bezvodovka (Ukraine)
DescriptionMany Earthmounds have been discovered in the Region of Bezvodivka in the Ukraine. It s not clear yet if these are Graves but they can be used as a solar-calendar and as a tool to calculate the lunar cycle known as the Meton cycle, as well as to study the motion of the planets and stars in the sky. Long-term observation of the motion of celestial bodies, and knowledge of the laws of celestial mechanics, allowed the determination of the date of the lunar and solar eclipses and even the displacement of the equinoxes on the horizon due to variations in the Earths axis called precession.

Oleksandr Klykavka is an agrochemist and soil scientist from the National Agricultural University in Kyiv, Ukraine. He wrote: Bezvodovka solar observatory geometry is determined by the terrain of the area, however, at the same time, its mathematical proportions perfectly fit the landscape. The sorcerers/astronomers observed nature and its phenomena, and knew its laws, therefore the mathematics of the harmony of the surrounding world is presented within the observatory’s geometry. The horizon observatory of Bezvodovka is not a random group of land mounds, but rather is a complex planned mathematically with geometry. This is evidenced by the proportions laid by the architects into the observatory’s structure.
PlaceBezvodovka
CountryUkraine

points.name: Ancient industry complex in Baigong
points.description:
NameAncient industry complex in Baigong
DescriptionE.T.-Ruins is this place called by the local scientists. They found ancient tubes and high levels of Selenium and Vanadium in the fields. These elements are used in high technological processes. Was there an industrial complex based, a long time ago?
PlaceQinghai , near Mt. Baigong
CountryChina

points.name: Ancient Ruins found in Antarctica
points.description:
NameAncient Ruins found in Antarctica
DescriptionAncient ruins have allegedly been found in Antarctica. It appears to be 400ft across and man-made, with its discovery added to a mounting list of evidence which claims there could be a hidden city frozen underneath the surface.
Source: https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2548611/antarctica-building-structure-surface-image-people-lived-there/

The ancient map of turkish admiral piri reis astonishingly shows the Antarctic continent but not how it looks today but the continent and the coastal lines below the more than 2 km thick layer of ice.
Source: https://historydaily.org/ancient-map-shows-antarctica-coastline-without-ice

Could it be a coincidence that the german nazis were very interested in the frozen continent and even built bases there? What were the german nazis interested in finding there?
Source: https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2020632/secret-nazi-treasure-hunter-base-arctic-found-abandoned-poisoned-polar-bears/
PlaceAncient Ruins found in Antarctica
Countrynull

points.name: Angkor Wat
points.description:
NameAngkor Wat
DescriptionAngkor Wat is a huge temple complex (1.626 km²) in the region of Angkor in Cambodia.
It is assigned to the Khmer king Suryavarman II, built between 1113 - 1150 and dedicated to Vishnu. Since its rediscovery in 1860 many restoration work has been done to preserve this masterpiece of architecture. Angkor Wat is built out of around 5 million sandstone blocks with a weight up to 1,5t, transported from a quarry at least 40km away, which is an inredible achievement that still cant be explained up to day. Also does the conventional archological thesis propose that 1 ton of blocks would have been processed per minute for 37 years, which doesnt sound realistic to experts like Mohan Praveen. The main temple complex is sourrounded by a moat ( 1,5km x 1,3km). The centerpiece consists of a temple with 5 towers representing a Quincunx. The main tower is 65m high and hides a secret. A 27m deep vertical shaft leads to a stone box. What was the purpose of this box? The midday sun shines exactly in this deep shaft. Furthermore there is an alignment to spring equinox, when the sun rises exactly over the central tower. Angkor Wat is huge, yet all the walls are beautifully decorated with carvings showing scenes of the Ramayana and Mahabharata. In the region of Angkor there are more than 1.000 temples but we still know so little about them.
PlaceSiem Reap
CountryCambodia

points.name: Cave paintings of Wandinas - celestial beings
points.description:
NameCave paintings of Wandinas - celestial beings
DescriptionThe celestial figures are shown with big black glasses or eyes. Halos are around the gods. What did the natives see and paint on their holy places?
PlaceKimberley Range
CountryAustralia

points.name: Arkaim - The Stonehenge of Russia
points.description:
NameArkaim - The Stonehenge of Russia
DescriptionAt the Border between Russia and Khazakhstan lies Arkaim, discovered in 1987 by a team of Chelyabinsk scientists who were preparing the area to be flooded in order to create a reservoir. Photographs that were made from an Airplane showed strange spiral- and circular- shaped Structures. They were distributed over an area with a Diameter of 250 Kilometers. The Site was designated a cultural reservation in 1991.
Although the settlement was burned and abandoned, much detail is preserved. Arkaim is similar in form but much better preserved than neighbouring Sintashta, where the earliest chariot was unearthed. The site was protected by two circular walls. There was a central square, surrounded by two circles of dwellings separated by a street. The settlement covered ca. 20,000 m2 (220,000 sq ft). The diameter of the enclosing wall was 160 m (520 ft). It was built from earth packed into timber frames, and reinforced with unburned clay brick, with a thickness of 4–5 m (13–16 ft). and a height of 5.5 m (18 ft). The settlement was surrounded with a 2 m (6 ft 7 in)-deep moat.
Arkaim is dated around the 17th century BC and around 1,500 to 2,500 people could have lived in the settlement. Zdanovich also states that the whole complex was built according to the laws of Astronomy and Cosmology to use it as an Observatorium and Templecity. Arkaim is often called the Stonehenge of Russia.
The People of Arkaim used Copper to create Weapons, sickles, axes, Arrows and Spearheads. Further Evidence shows that also Gold was manufactured in this Area. Scientists also discovered a Skeleton with an elongated Skull in Arkaim.
Even though the site has been researched extensively, It s still unknown what Arkaim originaly was used for and why Arkaim was presumably burnt down and why it s citizens disappeared without a Trace.
PlaceKazakh Steppe, Bredinsky District, Chelyabinsk Oblast, Russia
CountryRussia

points.name: Avebury henge
points.description:
NameAvebury henge
DescriptionAvebury henge was build 2.600 - 2.500 BC and is one of the largest neolithic stone circles of the British Islands. The henge is situated in the south west of England in the county of Wiltshire and consists of one big circle and two smaller circles surrounded by a large earth wall. Originally there where 154 sandstones building up the henge, today only 36 are remaining. Most of the stones where destroyed on instruction of the christian church in the 14th century, they considered this Pagan site as something evil. Four entrances lead inside the henge, two of them starting points for long Menhir roads. Archaeologists assume that Avebury was used as a ritual place but there is no clear evidence for that. Could these structures had an astronomical purpose or did the stones strengthen the earth energie? There is no question, this must have been an important place otherwise such efforts would not have been taken. There are a lot of older monuments nearby such as Silbury Hill, West Kennet Long Barrow and Windmill Hill. This prehistoric landscape is one of a kind you can find so much peace there. Maybe that is why our ancestors had chosen this special place for their unique Structures.

Excerpt from Maria Wheatleys homepage:
As Avebury wasn’t included in their studies, Rodney Hale, David Webb, Busty Taylor and myself conducted a series of tests to investigate the background ionising radiation levels at selected locations within the Avebury Henge complex.
Rodney Hale was one of the original members of the Dragon Project and developed some of the instruments used in their researches. I was delighted that he could join us. Using a recording Geiger counter we selected an area close to Avebury’s Obelisk marker stone, which marks the near centre of the southern inner circle. The area was monitored for 20 minutes, followed by 20 minutes at a point some 3 metres to the south. The readings were analysed by Rodney using the statistical ‘T-test’ to determine if there were any significant differences between the readings taken at the two locations. The expression ‘significant’ is commonly used when there is a probability of 95% or more that the difference really exists. However, no significant difference was detected at the Obelisk marker stone.

The next location was a central position near the North West end of the West Kennet Stone Avenue, which was monitored for 18 minutes, followed by 18 minutes outside of the avenue. The mean count within the avenue was 68.3 and outside it was 70.1, which does not calculate any difference but did register changes that we followed up.

Energy investigations at Avebury
I suggested that we go to the Sanctuary on Overton Hill. According to the antiquarian, Dr. William Stukeley, the Sanctuary was the ‘Head of Avebury’s Serpent Temple’. The centre of the monument was chosen as it was sited above the crossing point of two earth currents, a geospiral and numerous fissure systems radiate from the centre making the location a geodetic hot-spot.

The Sanctuary – the stones were removed in 18th century. Today concrete markers depict their former positions and also the location of large timber posts.

It was monitored for 20 minutes, then 20 minutes outside of the site, and finally a further 15 minutes at the centre. When the readings were analysed by Rodney the results were startling as the levels of radiation were significantly higher at the centre than outside of the stone circle. Statistically there was a probability of about 98% that there was a real difference. Plotting the counts per minute at the Sanctuary showed an interesting effect seen clearly on the graph.
Interestingly, this was the opposite result to the Dragon Project’s findings, which noted lower radiation within stone circles. Here we discovered something new and completely different.

Researchers have noted that natural radiation levels at ancient sites can produce strange and mysterious effects, such as flickering lights and even mirages have been reported. Mysterious lights are still being seen at the Sanctuary and one person told me that he saw a small flickering light emerge from the centre of the monument, which darted around for a while before suddenly disappearing.
PlaceAvebury
CountryUnited Kingdom

points.name: Şona pyramids
points.description:
NameŞona pyramids
DescriptionOn the right bank of the Olt, 5 kilometers from the city of Făgăraş, in a village like any other, Şona, some extremely high elevations of earth have lasted for thousands of years, which look very much like some pyramids.

The pyramids at Şona are 8 mounds up to 30 meters high, arranged in two rows and, very interestingly, are arranged in order of height. The eight mounds can be seen from afar, but only after you approach them can you realize their impressive size. The perfect placement of the pyramids on two parallel lines was one of the starting points that gave rise to speculation.

Some historians assert that these mounds are nothing more than tombs of Celtic cheftains, who arrived in Transylvania before the Dacians. The population of those times used to bury their chiefs in large mounds of ground with their jewels and precious objects, but also used to make more such graves to discourage the thieves and evildoers. But the locals say out and loud that these ground mounds’ formation due to giants, who lived many years ago on this territory. The legend says that this land was ruled by a princess, whose name was Sona. One day, her kingdom was attacked by some giants came from Fagaras Mountains, went through the Olt River’s water and reaching this place, shook the mud from their feet and the threw away ground created these mounds. Villagers say that strange things are also happening in this area. For example, meat won’t rot even if it’s left in the area for days while water will stay fresh and even become curative. Also, some locals were very curious to find out what’s hiding inside and therefore tried to dig into the mound, but they were stopped by the authorities. Even archaeologists haven’t managed yet to unravel the mysteries of the Sona pyramids.
PlaceȘona
CountryRomania

points.name: Baalbek
points.description:
NameBaalbek
DescriptionThe biggest quarried stone blocks worldwide can be found here. The largest block weights 1242 tons. The foundation of the later Roman temple is made of such gigantic blocks. How did an ancient culture move them?
PlaceBaalbeck Temple, Baalbek District, Gouvernement Bekaa, Libanon
CountryLebanon

points.name: Cavepaintings and petroglyphs in caves and grottos in Bahia, Brazil
points.description:
NameCavepaintings and petroglyphs in caves and grottos in Bahia, Brazil
DescriptionEdison Boaventura Jr. , researcher and president of the Grupo Ufologica de Guaruja discovered many interesting cave-paintings and petroglyps throughout the country of Brazil and wrote about it in a detailed article in the magazine Sagenhafte Zeiten No. 5/2012. Many of these cave-paintings and petroglyphs seem to depict extraterrestrial beings or ufos. There are many similarities between the depictions of worldwide cave-paintings and petroglyphs.

The great mystery of these petroglyphs lies in the fact that no one can say with certainty what our ancient ancestors wanted to illustrate with the pictorial representations of these mysterious beings. Where did our ancestors get the inspiration to depict these beings? What did they want to tell us?
PlaceCaves and grottos in the state of Bahia in Brazil
CountryBrazil

points.name: Baalbek launch site for spaceships
points.description:
NameBaalbek launch site for spaceships
DescriptionThe temples at Baalbek were built by the Romans and the Greek, but the basement where the temples were built on is much older. The basement is made of processed stones, measuring up to 20 meters in length, 4.50 meters in height and 4 meters in width and up to 2000 tons of weight, which makes them belonging probably to the heaviest megalithic structures in the world.

In the classic documentary Chariots of the Gods (1973) of Dr. Erich von Däniken its narrated that no scientific explanation exists how these stones were made and transported. It is said that the Russian scientist Dr. Matest (1915-2005) claims the basement was used as a launch site for extra terrestrian space ships.

The Belarusian-American natural scientist Dr. Matest M. Agrest (1915-2005) is one of the academic pioneers of pre-astronautics or paleo-SETI research. He graduated in 1938 from Leningrad State University (now Saint Petersburg State University), where he received a PhD in formal science, physics and mathematics in 1946. In 1970, he became head of the university laboratory there. With his writings Matest M. Agrest undoubtedly belonged to the most important pioneers of later representatives of paleo-SETI research, such as Peter Krassa, Robert Charroux and Erich von Däniken. He is famous as the doyen of the ancient astronaut theory in the field of Palaeo-SETI.

It is stunning to look at the basement of Baalbek and also unreal if considered how the ancient people should have built such a incredible huge baseplate, because today sophisticated heavy duty machinery would be required, as well as intelligent engineering skills. How were they capable to achieve this labor? A highly academic scientist does claim this site was used as an extra terrestrial launch site which may sound mind-boggling and makes this entire site a great mystery.
PlaceBacchustempel, Baalbek, Lebanon
CountryLebanon

points.name: Band of holes - The avenue of Pockmarks
points.description:
NameBand of holes - The avenue of Pockmarks
DescriptionHere in the valley of Pisco some hundred meters north of the high way you find one hole after another in the dry soil of the slope. Widthwise, there are always eight holes next to one another. Each hole is about one meter deep and of the same width. And each hole has remnants of a wall. No matter whether you look up or down the mountain, the ticker tape is always visible. It is like a tapeworm or as if a scarifier precisely eight spikes wide had been rolled up and down the hill. The width of the band is about 24 meters, the length could not be determined. By good weather, you can see the band climbing up the other side of the valley. (South of the street).
PlaceHacienda Montesierpe, Band of Holes, Provinz Pisco, Peru
CountryPeru

points.name: Barabar and Nagarjuni Caves
points.description:
NameBarabar and Nagarjuni Caves
DescriptionThe Barabar Hill Caves are situated in the twin hills of Barabar (four caves) and Nagarjuni (three caves) in the Makhdumpur region of the Jehanabad district in Bihar, India.
The Lomas-Rishi cave consists of two rooms, a rectangular room measuring 9.86x5.18m, and a circular, semi-hemispherical room 5m in diameter.
The Sudama cave consists of two rooms, a rectangular room measuring 9.98x5.94m, and a semi-hemispherical room 6m in diameter.
The Karan-Chaupar cave consists of a single rectangular room with polished surfaces, 10.2x4.27m in dimensions.
The Visvakarma cave consists of a rectangular room entirely open to the outside, a sort of elongated porch, and an unfinished semi-hemispherical room: the rectangular space measures 4.27x2.54m, and the circular room is 2.8m in diameter.
The Gopika cave consists of a single large oblong room of 13.95x5.84m.
The Vadathika cave consists of a single rectangular room sized 5.11x3.43m, with a porch at the entrance of 1.83x1.68m.
The Vapiyaka cave consists of a single rectangular room of dimensions 5.10x3.43m.

They are thought to date back to the 3rd century BCE during the Maurya period, and to correspond respectively to Ashoka (reigned 273–232 BCE) and his grandson, Dasharatha Maurya. The caves at Barabar and Nagarjuni are the earliest examples of rock-cut architecture in India and most of them consist of two chambers, carved entirely out of very hard granite, with a highly polished internal surface, the so called Mauryan polish also found on sculptures, and exciting accoustic resonance effects.

Scientists are still not sure how the caves have been carved out of the very hard granite rock and how they achieved such a mirror-like polish of the cavewalls (see picture section). Another mystery is the fact that the caves resonate to very specific frequencies and would therefor had to been built with a very high knowledge in accoustics and architecture.

Just recently, the BAM- (Builders of the ancient mysteries) research team did some very elaborate research at the caves including 3D-laserscans and archaeoaccoustic measurement. They found out that the architecture of the caves is very precise in their dimensions (2 to 8 milimeters on a length of more than 13 meters) and subsequent builders have never managed to achieve the same level of precision and finish again. We can see this mysterious fact in many places around the world, where the oldest structures are often the most precise and perfect. The accoustic properties of the caves are also highly sophisticated because the shape of the caves leads to a suppression of the echo in the caves in favor of accoustic resonance. The caves behave like resonance chambers and tests show that when you are standing in the center of the room, certain frequencies make precise body parts vibrate. The Karan Chopar cave resonates at a frequencies of 200 Hz, 400 Hz, 800 Hz, 1000 Hz and 1200 Hz. The Gopika cave resonates at 200 Hz, 400 Hz, 800 Hz and 1200 Hz. The Vadathika cave resonates at 200 Hz and 1000 Hz. Could these resonant vibrations be comparable to the acoustic chamber in the Hypogeum in Malta where a scientist found out that the vibrations can influence human consciousness? It s also important to mention that the caves are located on a discontinuity-point of the earths crust.
PlaceMakhdumpur region of the Jehanabad district in Bihar, India
CountryIndia

points.name: Bent Pyramid
points.description:
NameBent Pyramid
DescriptionThe Bent Pyramid is one of two amazing pyramids at the site of Dahshur. Egyptology dates the Bent Pyramid back to the 4th dynasty, Old Kingdom, build by king Sneferu (2670-2620 B.C.). In his reign (approx.30 – 50 years) he built 3 pyramids, two of them are so called failures, the one in Meidum and the Bent Pyramid. His last one, the Red Pyramid in Dahshur was a succes. One of the facts that make the Bent Pyramid so special are the two different angles of its construction. At the lower part it starts with 55° to a height of 45m then the angle was changed to 43°. Due to foundation and construction problems the steep angle had to be changed to a flatter one. In 2014 a project named Time Scanners scanned the exterior of the Bent Pyramid. As a result they stated that the pyramid was designed like this, there where no foundation problems. A lot of casing stones are still in place because they are slightly sloping inwards. This pyramid is one of the best preserved ones in Egypt but sadly the least explored. The first exploration was done in 1839 by Perring. In 2012 the ISIDA-Project made the first colour pictures of the interior. And since 2019 the pyramid is open to tourists.The pyramid has two entrances one in the north and one in the west with two independent shaft systems. The northern entrance has a descending passage, an antechamber, a main chamber and a so called chimney. The chimney is quite interesting, it was build closely to the central pyramid axis, it has a deep shaft now covered with stones. It is not yet known how deep this shaft goes.The western entrance has also a descending passage a horizontal corridor with two blocking stones wich could me moved up and down. The upper chamber is in a very bad condition, there probably had been a lot of modification and even destruction during the last 4.500 years.Today the two shaft systems are connected by the winding passage (a roughly cut shaft). A lot of questions come to mind: did Sneferu really build 3 huge pyramids in 30-50 years? If the Bent Pyramid was a failure why finish it, why building a satellite pyramid, a valley and pyramid temple and even an enclosure wall. Why is this pyramid still standing and the shaft systems is not collapsed? Why two entrances? What was the purpose of the strange chimney? A lot of research should be done to answer this questions.
PlaceDahshur
CountryEgypt

points.name: Chaco Canyon - Anasazi
points.description:
NameChaco Canyon - Anasazi
DescriptionThe Anasazi people once lived in the southwestern United States. They left behind for posterity sites as fascinating as they were mysterious in the steep, impassable canyons of the barren land. Archaeologists puzzle over who designed the master plan for these astronomically oriented sites, which was followed for generations until the day the sacred centers were suddenly abandoned. Were the Anasazi following divine instructions?

Todays archaeologists are perplexed and intrigued by a phenomenon they have named the Chaco Phenomenon. Seemingly without transition, the Anasazi find themselves carrying out a building project that must have been designed, planned and executed by an entire team of architects, astronomers, mathematicians, civil engineers, masons, artists, designers and surveyors. If they had just built simple pit houses, now suddenly grandiose stone metropolises, Great Houses, as they are admired by archaeologists, were created, which look as if they had been designed on a drawing board.

Archaeologists are faced with a mystery: How could such a sudden cultural leap have happened? Who or what could have triggered it? The whole thing must have been deliberate, intelligent planning. A gigantic, interwoven, designed and planned construction project. Everything is in the exact place intended and calculated beforehand. Among Southwest archaeologists, there was talk of the mysterious master plan - but who had been these intelligent and high-level master planners? Where from all of a sudden this astonishing building logistics of people who shortly before knew only primitive earth-stone walls? These simple basket makers should have suddenly applied highly developed architecture, astronomy and engineering? What troubled archaeologists most was the suddenness of this cultural leap, which occurred sometime shortly before or after the year 800.

Studies and research by the Solstice Project, an interdisciplinary group of scientists focusing on archaeoastronomy, and other experts have revealed intriguing geometric-astronomical patterns in the Anasazi region since the 1980s. Archaeologists speak enthusiastically of cosmic landscape architecture or solar and lunar geometry. On a large scale, the master plan reflected the cycles of the sun and moon. Not a single building in the Chaco phenomenon stands in its place without a metric reason. There are several lines in Chaco Canyon alone that have been aligned to specific dates of the solar cycles, more often designed to lunar cycles. These connect Great Houses and Great Kivas with each other and cross each other, also including Outlier-Great-Houses. No archaeologist has yet found an answer to the question for what purpose all these lines were laid out.

But the most important question is this: Who were the mysterious master planners who were apparently suddenly there and had the master plan ready and waiting? There are traditions about Katchinas, culture bringers from the stars, who are said to have lived among the Indians for some time and then left again. Localities of the Chaco phenomenon appear again and again in the traditions about these Kachinas. In addition, strange star beings appear on petroglyphs of the period after the end of the Anasazi culture. Why has no Southwest archaeologist yet suspected a connection here? So, if no other known culture and not even the simple pit house Anasazi come into question as master planners - who then? Are we dealing with an intervention by representatives of an alien intelligence here?
PlaceChaco Canyon
CountryUnited States

points.name: Bosnian Pyramids Visoko
points.description:
NameBosnian Pyramids Visoko
DescriptionAs the business man and alternative historian Semir Sam Osmanagich announced at an international press conference in October 2005 that he had visited Visoko in todays Bosnia-Herzegovina, and that he found the remains of two giant pyramids and ancient underground tunnel networks, it was the starting signal for a unique science crime, which continues to this day.
There are many people, no doubt, from various scientists. However, in the last decade various interesting anomalies were found during the investigation, which have remained mysterious to this day.
Due to the lack of evidence, the hope remains deceptive. But surely many people wanted to discover something different such as Stone Spheres and many others.
There are a large number of different links about the Bosnian pyramids.
PlaceVisoko
CountryBosnia and Herz.

points.name: Buritaca 200
points.description:
NameBuritaca 200
DescriptionThousands of artificial platforms in the hills of the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta. More stones were used than in Machu Pichu. The Kogi tribe is one of the rare culture which survived the Spanish conquest in the isolated jungle valleys. The Kogis until today use to be in contact with their heavenly teachers. They also know the story of the great flood.
PlaceCiudad Perdida (Lost City), Magdalena, Colombia
CountryColombia

points.name: Cairn de Gavrinis
points.description:
NameCairn de Gavrinis
DescriptionThe small island of Garvrinis lies directly next to the two stone circles of Er Lannic, which are partly disintegrating under the water. Before the sea level rose, Gavrinis and Er Lannic were part of the landmass. Gavrinis is a mere 750 meters long and 400 meters wide. The island is fringed by trees. Mossy grass and rampantly proliferating gorse cushions oness steps, as if a thick carpet had been laid down leading into the sacred place. And what a sacred place it is! For the passage grave on the hillock has been fitted with a mathematical message which can turn us smart-alecks speechless. The Stone Agers began by completely flattening the hill on the island of Gavrinis. Then they carted huge quantities of stones of various sizes to the building site and also rolled a few dozen cyclopic megaliths along. Even the floor of the passage grave consists of slabs. The builders must have known from the beginning that they were creating a message for eternity. The entrance consists of two vertical stone slabs with a horizontal one on top. This is followed by a gallery, flanked and covered by monoliths, into the interior of the artificial hill. Then there is the sanctum, also called the burial chamber, although a grave has never been found. This burial chamber is a further 2.6 meters long, 2.5 meters wide and 1.8 meters high. It is formed by six mighty slabs and covered by a gigantic ceiling slab which measures 3.7 by 2.5 meters. In total, 52 megaliths were used to build the actual passage grave, of which half were engraved with strange symbols, with a mathematical message.
PlaceCairn de Gavrinis
Countrynull

points.name: Carnac - Geometrical over siced stone alignments and dolmen
points.description:
NameCarnac - Geometrical over siced stone alignments and dolmen
DescriptionMillennia before Pythagoras, our stoneage ancestors constructed lines and heavy dolmen in an overarching system – including Pythagorean triangles. What is the message in the stones telling us?
PlaceCarnac, Bretagne, France
CountryFrance

points.name: Cart Ruts
points.description:
NameCart Ruts
DescriptionAnother mystery of the mediterranian sea are the so called Cart Ruts. Reported from Turkey, Sardegna, Malta, even Ireland. But how have they been made. The changing distance between two tracks makes any fix axis impossible. And if they have indented to hard rock, where are the ox or even human trails? On several occasions, they continue under sea level, that proofs the raise of the water level, after they existed. So when did that happened? Not as long as our history knows...Something is wrong here!
PlaceGhar il-Kbir, Dingli, Malta
CountryMalta

points.name: Chandravalli Caves, India
points.description:
NameChandravalli Caves, India
DescriptionChandravalli is a prehistoric archaeological site in the Chitradurga district in Karnataka, India and the Chandravalli Caves are a very strange and bizzare place. Chandravalli (translated as moon shaped) was known as Chandanavati, name attributed to the king as this place was once ruled by Chandrahasa (king of Kuntala). In the area, there is also a split rock that, from it s shape, resembles a crescent moon. This rock might have given the place it s name.

The size of the caves are estimated to be around six million squarefeet. The caves are a wild, mazelike mix of different architectual and historical building styles. There are megalithic elements mixed with brick- and plaster- walls and there are also many structural elements that seem to make no logical sense because they are in narrow niches, arranged in strange angles or simply do not seem to allow any logical explanation at all. Many passages are very narrow and normal sized people have to crouch and squeeze through very small doorways. In the whole Chandravalli area, there are also other very strange structures, temples and buildings that, like mentioned before, don t realy make any sense because they re placed in almost impossible and inaccessible locations or there is no logical explanation on their once intended usage.

Indian researcher Praveen Mohan was on site to conduct a detailed investigation of the mysterious caves and found, in addition to all the facts already mentioned, some old archeological records which date the site to the iron age (at least 3200 years ago) and that during an excavation, a part of a sarcophagus-style object has been found at the site. (See video-links below).
PlaceChandravalli Caves, Chitradurga district, Karnataka, India
CountryIndia

points.name: Chavin de Huantar - mysterious temple of an unknown culture
points.description:
NameChavin de Huantar - mysterious temple of an unknown culture
DescriptionUnder the main area lies a net of corridors and small rooms with ununderstood depictions. El Lanzon must have been placed during the construction of the corridors, because it is too big to move it down there through the corridors. You can find strange stone heads which remember to cargo cults. Missunderstood technology. Also the Raimondi-stele is very mysterious. What did the constructors wanted to show? Today you can find the Raimondi-stele in the anthropological museum in Lima. It is diorite stone and carved as we could not do it today with our tools. Incredible precise. The archaelogists speak of a jaguar-human with snake hairs...or is it just misunderstood technology?
Newest researches proof incredible acustic effects in these tunnels. How and for what purpose, the constructors build and used those effects?
PlaceChavin de Huantar
CountryPeru

points.name: Colossi of Memnon
points.description:
NameColossi of Memnon
DescriptionThe Colossi of Memnon is 3500 years old. The original two huge statues have been carved out of one single stone, after an earthquake they have been partially reconstructed. Erich von Däniken states that measurements gave 21 meters of height and each of them weighs a staggering 1000 tons of quartzite sandstone. The stones have been transported over 600 kilometeres away from the Mokkatam Hills.

Up to date it is not clear how these stones or statue have been transported and how this task has been accomplished with the methods and engineerings skills back then. For better understanding the following example is given, to give an impression, what labour and engineering skills must have been available back then. As example the relocation project of the Abu Simbel Temple is given. The Abu Simbel had to be relocated during the building process of the Aswan Dam. Multiple countries were involved in the planning and relocation project. 3000 measurements were made for the relocation plan and all parts of the temple, including statues as well, had to be cut into many parts. It was a giant challenge to accomplish. Also the most powerful cranes of the world were challenged as the cranes stock capabilities were maxed out and further assistance through machinery with hydraulic technology was required to achieve the goal. Now the question arises how the people over 3000 years ago did achieve this incredible task, where no hydraulic assisted super powerful cranes existed.

Dr. Erich von Däniken points out and emphasizes that the transportation and entire building process of the Colossi of Memnon statues was an impossible task to accomplish back in these ages where people lived in simple houses, in consideration with their engineering skills, level and technology available back then. Hence there must have been a kind of knowledge transfer to the ancient people, how to plan and construct. The possibility is given, that the information how to plan and construct at this level of engineering has been given from extra terrestrials, as well do countless stories exist in different cultures, how knowledge from so called gods or other beings has been transfered to humans. Until we dont know for sure how this extremely heavy statue has been transported back then or how they managed to aquire the necessary knowledge and the possibility exists for real, that extra terrestrials may have been involved, it remains a great mystery.
PlaceThebes, Egypt
CountryEgypt

points.name: Fort Victoria - Zimbabwe
points.description:
NameFort Victoria - Zimbabwe
DescriptionIs it a castle or residence? Or a kind of cargo cult - the walls have no defense advantage use, and the tower is a massive pillar.
PlaceThe Great Enclosure - Great Zimbabwe National Monument
CountryZimbabwe

points.name: Coral Castle
points.description:
NameCoral Castle
DescriptionEdward Leedskalnin (January 12, 1887 – December 7, 1951) built this megalithic “park/castle” on his own. He even moved the whole construction from it’s original place – the truck drivers had to leave for one night, on the other day, the blocks were placed on the trucks). Nobody ever saw him building it, he worked mostly over night with a simple tripod on which a mysterious small box was fixed on top. He claimed to know the construction solutions of the ancient Egypts. The heaviest coral block weights 30 tons. The total weight of the castle is 1100 tons.
PlaceHomestead, FL, USA (near Miami)
CountryUnited States

points.name: Core drillings in Abu Sir
points.description:
NameCore drillings in Abu Sir
DescriptionIn Abu Sir you find thousands of holes drilled into Diorite rocks. Diorite has a temper of 8.4 (Mohssche hardness scale) and is thus harder than granite. That means, that the workers had tools which are harder than 8.4 - which would be for example diamant. You can clearly prove the core drill technology (see pictures). But the datings which were made talk about an age of 4500 years. How did they do it? Sometimes the drilled stones look like exercise pieces or as someone has played with a drilling tool.
PlaceAbu Sir
CountryEgypt

points.name: Cromlech de Mzoura
points.description:
NameCromlech de Mzoura
DescriptionAnother stone circle and a big monolith...lets find out more about it!
PlaceCromlech de Mzoura, Mzoura, Marokko
CountryMorocco

points.name: Delphi - Apollos place
points.description:
NameDelphi - Apollos place
DescriptionApollo on his travels around our globe, found settled people here. He teached them building houses and agriculture in the mountains, and brought culture. Twice a year he left in his sun disc to the lands of the Hyperborean.
All ancient cities in Greece are lying since millennia on a geometrical grid.
PlaceDelphi
CountryGreece

points.name: Dolmen Rügen
points.description:
NameDolmen Rügen
Description54 megalithic tombs are still standing on the island of Rügen (Baltic Sea). Only 54 of originally at least 254 tombs have stand the face of time. Rügen itself has a long history of settlement, it was the gateway to the north and it´s amber was eversince a very rare and precious good to trade with. Therefore one can find many traces of the past and also one of the highest concentration of megalithic tombs in Germany. Dolmen were built between 3.500 - 1.500 B.C., this culture of megalithic builders lasted 2.000 years! Most of the tombs are built out of hughe granite boulders (high quarzkristall content) which were remains of the last ice age. The construction consists of smaller standing stones which carry large cap stones weighing up to 10t. A lot of the granite boulders were flattened on one side, finally the stones were covered with an earth mound. How did they move, carve and transport these massive boulders? We have to overthink our view towards the neolithic people. They were able to plan and organize such projects, furthermore they knew about the celestial movements and aligned the tombs to special days of the year (equinoxes, solstices). In some constructions the megalithic yard can be detected ( 0,83m), it was a standard measure used all over europe in the neolithic. Not only the stones overlast time a lot of myths and legends are passed down up till today, some of the stones are supposed to have healing powers. For the neolithic people these megalithic structures were holy places and death was not the end of life it was a part of it.
PlaceLancken-Granitz
CountryGermany

points.name: Dragon Houses of Euboea
points.description:
NameDragon Houses of Euboea
DescriptionQuote from Ramon Zürchers Article in SAGENHAFTE ZEITEN(German) No. 5/2018:
...We are standing in front of the Dragon House of Mt. Ochi.
A magical first impression. The gigantic - or cyclopean - stone blocks lie perfectly layered and interlocked in each other and on top of each other. Their dimensions, the straight lines and angles, are a unique contrast that sets the structure apart from the surrounding rocks. Like in a created order amidst the natural surrounding chaos. This structure is a testament to technological ingenuity in a distant intangible past. Reverentially, we enter the mighty entrance of the 12.7 x 7.7 m building ... and stand in a huge hall. One feels very small and marvels at the floating giants above. How was this gorgeous work accomplished, on a barren mountain, with the worst possible conditions? For each lifting, crane, trees would have had to be carried to the summit, each tool, each rope. Unimaginable.
Even if the vegetation and climatic conditions were different at the time of construction, the monstrosity remains mysterious in terms of construction. The largest cover plate above the entrance measures 4 x 2 x 0.34 meters. We explore the walls and find countless slabs that have been worked into polygonal shapes for the purpose of better wedging. Each block is a unique piece!

More details also about the astronomical alignements, please see link below.
PlaceMont Ochi
CountryGreece

points.name: Durrington Shafts
points.description:
NameDurrington Shafts
DescriptionThe Durrington Shafts were found 3 km distant from Stonehenge, these huge pits ( 5m deep, 10m diameter) surround the henge enclosure of Durrington Walls. 20 pits have been found so far. It seems they build up a huge ring (2km diameter), not a perfect circle. The dimensions and the relation between the Durrington Shafts and other monuments again show a deep understanding of mathematics and astronomy. These shafts were probably built by the Grooved Ware Culture between 2670 - 2550 B.C. For what purpose? One theory is that the pits could have been sound resonators for low frequency sound ( Durrington Shafts: 10 - 15 Hz). This sound could influence the state of consciousness and could be responsible for paranormal experience. The waves of low frequency sound travel through the earth, could the pits have been used for communication between distant points?

Excerpt from www.ancient-origins.net:
Stonehenge Experiments

Supporting the idea that the ring of pits at Durrington might have functioned as sound resonators is work carried out in 1999 by chartered engineer Rodney Hale in the Stonehenge landscape. At two round barrows (Amesbury 43 & 47) he used an induction coil interacting with the earth’s magnetic field to measure the presence of low frequency activity. Resulting signals were amplified and recorded. Each tumulus was found to produce oscillatory readings showing the constant presence of ultra-low frequency (ULF) sub-audible sound vibrations in the range of 18 Hz in the first tumuli and 11 Hz in the second.* The amplitude of the sound could be increased by stamping on the ground, although Hale suspects that this could be quite easily affected by other factors including wind blowing across the surface of the tumulus.

Stonehenge tumuli vibrations. Waveforms showing ultra-low frequency activity recorded by Rodney Hale during an experiment in 1999 at two round barrows in the Stonehenge landscape. (Image credit: Rodney Hale)

Stonehenge tumuli vibrations. Waveforms showing ultra-low frequency activity recorded by Rodney Hale during an experiment in 1999 at two round barrows in the Stonehenge landscape. (Image credit: Rodney Hale)

Tests showed that the ULF activity was present everywhere on the barrows, yet dropped off sharply around 30 centimeters (a foot) from the edge of the mounds. What these trial tests implied was the existence in each of a large hollow cavity or internal structure easily able to generate sound. Was it possible that other tumuli in the Stonehenge landscape had similar internal structures? Had this been part of their original design, to generate low frequency sound?

The resonant frequency of the pits making up Durrington Shafts was found to be in the range of 10 to 15 Hz, low enough to produce not only very low frequency activity, but also infrasound. This has been linked with everything from the creation of altered states of consciousness in human subjects to a go-to explanation for paranormal experiences such as the feeling of presences and the seeing of ghosts.

ULF activity as well as infrasound has been detected in the underground chambers of the Great Pyramid in Egypt, suggesting that this might have been a factor in the architectural design of such monuments. It should be recalled that the Great Pyramid dates to circa 2600 BC, exactly the same time as Durrington Shafts. That its pits generated a similar frequency range adds weight to the idea that they too acted as sound resonators. If so, then how might this have been amplified? And more importantly, to what end?
PlaceDurrington
CountryUnited Kingdom

points.name: Easter Island
points.description:
NameEaster Island
DescriptionNot only the impressive Moais (statues) are mysterious on this Island - carving, transport, purpose? But also the legends and petroglyphs, telling the story of a bird man. Unreadable inscriptions were found, which have a similarity to the culture of Mohenjo-Daro (Indus Valley, Pakistan), and as well to celtic runes...
PlaceEaster Island, Chile
CountryChile

points.name: El Fuerte - The Strong
points.description:
NameEl Fuerte - The Strong
DescriptionA massive stone hill top, chiseled niches and mysterious grooves are the main attraction of that place. As someone would has played with a high-tech cutting tool.
PlaceEl Fuerte de Samaipata, Provinz Florida, Departamento Santa Cruz, Bolivien
CountryBolivia

points.name: El Lahun Pyramid
points.description:
NameEl Lahun Pyramid
DescriptionThe pyramid of El Lahun was build by Senusret II ( 1897-1878 B.C.), 12th dynasty, Middle Kingdom and is located near the Faiyum. It was one of the first mud brick pyramids and probably had a granite capstone. The first exploration took place in 1840. In 1889 Flinders Petrie found the entrance to the underground tunnel systems which are located on the north side of the pyramid. There is no direct connection between the pyramid and the tunnel system. Could the underground structure be much older and later the pyramid was build on top of it? There are 4 independent shaft systems but only through the so called tomb 10 one can get access to the pyramid (under the pyramid). The tunnels are very precisely cut into the bedrock. Most interestingly is tomb 10, the main chamber is build out of red granite and has a voulted ceiling (similar to the Menkaure Pyramid at Giza). The sarcophagus is an astonishing piece of work, it is so precisely and its corners are very sharp. Even for modern times it would be quite difficult to work so precisely. Strangely the sarcophagus is tilted 10cm to one side. If they could work so precisely, this was surely not by chance so what purpose had this tilt ? There is also no trace of a lid. The tunnels are very small, how could they bring this massive granite block into place? At the site of Lahun there are a lot of tombs and underground structures nearly unknown to us.
PlaceEl Lahun
CountryEgypt

points.name: Göbekli Tepe
points.description:
NameGöbekli Tepe
DescriptionMegalithic stone circles, built around 10 000 BC -are the oldest known artificial constructions of mankind. According to the official history 7000 years older than the Egyptian pyramids. The circle later were covered on purpose with earth and sand. For protection and preserving?
PlaceGöbekli Tepe
CountryTurkey

points.name: Erdmannli Formation
points.description:
NameErdmannli Formation
DescriptionThe place is called Erdmannli stone (Earth men stone). But it is actually not a single stone but a Trilith. As the word itself contains. It is a composition of three gigantic stone blocks. Officials are still disputing if it is naturally laid from the Reuss-glacier, or if its man made. We have stone hard proof, that the ancient giants were set up artificially. The formation is built on a moraine hill. This is loose gravel and stones, and the construction would just have submerged over the millennia. So, Georg Brunner (+) - he spent his whole life reevaluating this formation - was able to do a geo radar measurement. It clearly shows that there is a base construction for those giants.

A fourth stone plate is set up aside. Its purpose is to be a projection wall. Every year twice, in spring after March 21st (Equinox) and after September 21st a phantastic light show is displayed. In the afternoon from 4.45pm to 5.10pm the sun stands in an angle to send the light through the formation and displays a head of a wolf. Just for a few minutes.

The weight of the head stone is 55.3 tons ( 19.752 cubic meters) The approximate weight of the granite is 2.8 tons/cubic meter. This stone is on only three points in contact with the ones below, and this since the end of the last ice age.
We also calculated the volume and weight of the carry-stones (only the part which is above ground). Boulder A is 43.95 tons, and boulder B, which carries the biggest part of the weight, is 14.29 tons. We dont know at the moment, how deep they go into the ground, where the foundation starts. The amazing thing is that block B has a footprint of only 2.78 square meters at floor level. But it holds the main load of the capstone. See pictures of our calculations below.
This is a prime example for RamaR-fingerprint: Traces of ancient advanced engineering-skills.

You can find our 3D-model here: https://ramar.space/erdmannli-3d-prasentation/
Here you can find our documentation video in German: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JdN3WJmeGBk&t=5s (in cooperation with Hangar18b)
PlaceWohlen, Aargau
CountrySwitzerland

points.name: Estrella de Palpa mandala in Peru Nazca
points.description:
NameEstrella de Palpa mandala in Peru Nazca
DescriptionIn the Nazca desert, between the town of Nazca and Palpa this stunning mandala called Estrella de Palpa appeared with a suggested creation date between 800BC and 600BC, but if this is really represents the reality remains uncertain. The whole area is covered with geoglyphs as described in the real x-file ID504 at RAMAR.

The Sun-Star and Cross of Peru is well documented at world-mysteries.com (see in the links provided). Gilbert de Jong did measure the sun-star and cross formation in Peru which measures 180 feet in diameter. The huge circle inside of a square reminded him of a zodiac map, supported by the fact, that a nearby snake like creature exists, positioned at one point where de Jong expected to find the symbol for “Aries.” Also does Gilbert de Jong associate the mandala with the pottering and clothing findings of Helaine Silverman, especially with the mythical flying beeing through the sky, which he believes could represent the crossing of the Venus-loops. World-mysteries.com suggests that the creators of the Sun-Star and cross mandala used Sumerian Feet as the basic units of measure.

If Gilbert de Jong solved the Estrella de Palpa case remains a mystery. A further mystery seems the similarity between the Estrella de Palpa and the crop circle that occured in England, Wiltshire, 30.07.2000, Blackland (Morgans Hill). The crop circle has undisputable similarity with the old geoglyph.
PlaceEstrella de Palpa
CountryPeru

points.name: Gate of the Gods, Puerta de Hayu Marca, Aramu Muru
points.description:
NameGate of the Gods, Puerta de Hayu Marca, Aramu Muru
DescriptionThe Gate of the Gods (Puerta de Hayu Marca, Aramu Muru) is a huge stone carving near Lake Titicaca in Peru. The flat stone is approximately 23 ft (7.0 m)square, with a T-shaped alcove measuring 6 feet and 6 inches (198 cm) tall carved into it.
There are legends surrounding the gate of the gods:
Another legend is about the time when the Spanish conquistadors arrived in Peru and plundered gold and precious gems of the Inca tribes - and an Inca priest of the Temple of the Seven Rays, named Aramu Muru fled from his temple with a sacred golden disc, known as the Key of the Gods of the Seven Rays. He hid it in the mountains of Hayu Marca. He finally emerged above the doorway watched by shamanic priests. He showed them the key of the gods and a ritual was performed, with the result of a magical event initiated by the golden disc, which opened the portal, and according to legend, blue light streamed from a tunnel inside. The priest Aramu Muru gave the golden disc to a shaman, disappeared through the portal and was never seen again.
You can read about the above mentioned legend in the book Lake Titicaca: Legend, Myth and Science by Charles Stanish which is linked below.

Do gateways to other dimensions or other places in space exist? Physicists and scientists propose such possibilities, for example the famous Einstein-Rosen-Bridge or a so called wormhole. But did our ancestors already posses such knowledge or even a technology to make this possibility a reality?
PlaceIlave in the Province El Collao (Departement Puno) in Peru
CountryPeru

points.name: Geoglyphs in Kazakhstan
points.description:
NameGeoglyphs in Kazakhstan
DescriptionNASA satellites took pictures from the Kazakhstan desert, where geoglyphs like in Nazca appeared in the ground. Only recognizable from the air/above.
PlaceNot clear located yet
CountryKazakhstan

points.description:
NameGeoglyphs in the Atacama Desert, Chile
DescriptionLike all over the world (see related mysteries) you find here oversized geoglyphs, recognizable only from above - the air or distance.
PlaceAtacama Desert - exact position to be located: Do it:-)
CountryChile

points.name: Gosford Hieroglyphs - Woy woy Glyphs -Kariong, Australia
points.description:
NameGosford Hieroglyphs - Woy woy Glyphs -Kariong, Australia
DescriptionOriginal Egyptian hieroglyphs or hoax? Very controversial story! On the same hill are sacred aboriginal places.
You can find lichens in the grooves, lichens grow extremely slow.
Did the ancient Egypts travel over oceans like the early Chinese -> see Thor Heyerdal
PlaceThe Gosford Glyphs, Woy Woy Rd, Kariong NSW 2250, Australia
CountryAustralia

points.description:
NameGrandsoult Glyphs
DescriptionA geoglyph of a crocodile/alligator formed by shaping the river and landscape. One of many in the Razlog Valley, with the village Bachevo being the focus of all the glyphs
PlaceBachevo
CountryBulgaria

points.name: Great Pyramid on the Giza Plateau
points.description:
NameGreat Pyramid on the Giza Plateau
DescriptionThe Great Pyramid of Giza (also known as the Pyramid of Khufu or the Pyramid of Cheops) is the oldest and largest of the three pyramids in the Giza pyramid complex bordering what is now El Giza, Egypt. It is the oldest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, and the only one to remain largely intact.
PlacePlateau of Giza
CountryEgypt

points.name: Gunung Padang
points.description:
NameGunung Padang
DescriptionMegalithic basalt blocks construction on a mountain top, which is not yet assigned to culture. Next basalt pillars source can be found in central Java. Approximately 400 km far from here.
PlaceGunung Padang, Java, Indonesia
CountryIndonesia

points.name: Hagar Qim
points.description:
NameHagar Qim
DescriptionThe megalithic temples of Hagar Qim and L-Imnajdra, show an incredible relation to a high levelled astronomy. According to some specialists, the temples are orientated to an astronomical situation 10 000 BC. The Mediterranean sea is full of Megalithic structures!
PlaceHagar Qim and L-Imnajdra temples
CountryMalta

points.name: Hathor temple complex with carving of a light bulb in a krypta in the base
points.description:
NameHathor temple complex with carving of a light bulb in a krypta in the base
DescriptionIn the base of the Hathor temple you find a narrow entrance to a krypta. The walls are full with hieroglyphs and depictions of different subjects. In the left chamber you can find a depiction of two objects which look like light bulbs. Together with the Djed-Pillar. Some researchers, like Reinhard Habeck, have reconstructed these light bulbs. Is it possible that the ancient Egypts have known electricity? A strong proof for this is, that excavators have found little vases, which are equiped with copper and iron. Rests of different acids were detected. These vases were simple calvanic batteries.
PlaceDendera
CountryEgypt

points.name: Hattusa - Hittites capital
points.description:
NameHattusa - Hittites capital
DescriptionHattusa was the capital city of the Hittites. Todays ruins are spread over the whole valley. Megalithic wall constructions and mixed creatures as gate keepers survived until today. The earliest settlement was dated back to 6000 BC. and it stays in direct connection with the mythology of the Gods - as teachers from the heavens, incl. the nearby sanctuary of Yazilikaya.
PlaceHattusha
CountryTurkey

points.name: Hueyatlaco - Forbidden archeology
points.description:
NameHueyatlaco - Forbidden archeology
DescriptionInside the Valsequillo reservoir Hueyatlaco is a one of the archeological sites in the fields of forbidden archeology. Several archeologists have dig at this particular location and analyzed specimen for their age. The specimen have been analyzed through the years with different dating technologies like fission dating, Uranium Series Disequilibrium dating, C14, volcano tephra dating or Helium-Thor-Uranium dating. Juan Armenta Camacho (in 1959) Hanna Marie Wormington (in 1962), Cynthia Irwin Williams (in 1962, 1964, 1966) and Virginia Steen-McIntyr (in 1966), Marshall Payn (in 1997) and Nick Carter (in 1997) analyzed several specimen in order to date the archeological site where ancient stone tools have been found. They analyzed the remains with different kind of age-dating methods, all dating methods suggested the remains where over 250000 and up to 500000 years old. This age dating is very controversial to the modern anthropological view point in science which says humans settled in Central America around 12000-13000 years ago. Also Virgina Steen-McIntyr has been dismissed from the archeological community after publishing these controversial age-dating numbers, which makes this mystery even more profound. Michael Cremo and other researchers mention this case deeply. Also extremely strange but not less interesting is that all artifacts disappeard which have been found at this site, which seem to corroborate that a conspiracy has been going on in this case. Stories as of Jose Lorenzo exist where this man has sent armed guys to chase away the archeologists working on the site, because he wanted to stop the project because of the dating results which were contrary to mainstream science. Is it possible that as in other known cases the Smithsonian institute did withhold artifacts that contradict the accepted history of evolution?
PlaceHueyatlaco
CountryMexico

points.name: Mycenae - Greek megalithic fortress
points.description:
NameMycenae - Greek megalithic fortress
DescriptionMegalithic stonewalls in an ancient fortress on the top of the hill with the famous Lion-Gate. Gigantic blocks!
Nearby you find treasure domes. Huge anonymous domes, without any inscriptions or ornaments. One of the doors deck beam of the Treasure house of Atreus weights about 120 tons.
PlaceMycenae
CountryGreece

points.name: Kalkajaka (Black Mountain), Australia
points.description:
NameKalkajaka (Black Mountain), Australia
DescriptionBlack Mountain consists of huge, black Granite Boulders, pilled precouriously one on top of the other. Called Kalkajaka, or Mountain of Death by the local Aborigines, black Mountain with it s numerous dark Passageways and Caverns is considered a cursed and evil Place. Elder Aborigines told their Children that when they enter the Black-Mountain-Caves, they will not return. Many People have been disappeared in the Black Mountains, even Rescue-Teams vanished in the Mountains.
Some Adventurers have tried to solve the Secrets of Black-Mountain, but many Caves and tunnels only lead to Dead Ends. In the Sydney Mail newspaper from April 24, 1935 the following is reported:
The disappearances read more like chapters from a book of fairy-tales, and they constitute one of the most amazing stories in the police history of the Far North, for not one of the mysteries has been solved, and probably never will be. When the Cook Highway is continued from Port Douglas to Cooktown the road will pass close to the Black Mountain, and this grim pile of granite slabs should prove of interest to geologists and others, in view of the fact that the aborigines declare that the mountain was erected years ago by a now defunct tribe of giants! There is some beautiful country around the mountain — dense forest teeming with marvellous bird and insect life.
Source: https://trove.nla.gov.au/newspaper/article/166110337?searchTerm=%22Harry%20Owens%22%20black%20mountains&searchLimits=

According to the Aborigines, the Black Mountains are sacred and holy because of the Rainbow-Serpent which supposedly lives in the Black-Mountains. If the Rainbow-Serpent gets disturbed by somebody, she may turn against you.
PlaceCooktown, Black Mountain National Park
CountryAustralia

points.name: Kenko Grande(Qenqo) -Stone blocks cut like butter
points.description:
NameKenko Grande(Qenqo) -Stone blocks cut like butter
DescriptionIncredible artificial stone structures near Sacsayhuaman, Cuzco, Peru. Stairs upside-down; Niches, holes, steps - like somebody would have played with a science-fiction-tool. The pictures speak for themselves.
PlaceQenqo, Cuzco, Peru
CountryPeru

points.name: Ladder to heaven, geoglyph
points.description:
NameLadder to heaven, geoglyph
DescriptionAn ancient Geoglyph has been discovered in Saudi Arabia which probably shows the ladder to heaven of Jacob from the old Testament. In the Bible, Jacobs ladder established contact between man and God and Angels were using the ladder to come from heaven to earth and to go from earth to heaven. Interestingly, such a ladder to heaven is also mentioned in ancient egyptian texts. Could this be an ancient description of extraterrestrial beings that visited humankind from the sky? Paleo-Seti experts have been studying the Bible for a long time from a modern and scientific point of view because many of the events mentioned in the Bible could be the result of technology and possibly even extraterrestrial influence or contact and are therefore not necessarily related to spiritual or mental experiences.
Detailed descriptions about this mystery can be found in the Book Pyramiden, Flut und Wiedergeburt by Bernd Grathwohl & Dr.Hermann Burgard or in an extensive text published in the magazine Sagenhafte Zeiten Issue No. 5/2019 by the same authors.
PlaceNorth of Taif, Saudi-Arabia
CountrySaudi Arabia

points.name: Lepenski Vir
points.description:
NameLepenski Vir
DescriptionThe archaeological site of Lepenski Vir is located in the Djerdap Gorge, on the low Danube terrace. It is the center of one of the most important prehistoric cultures. At the site of Lepenski Vir, the remains of sacral architecture were discovered from 7000 to 6000 years before the new era. What Lepenski Vir makes famous today and recognizable in the world are discoveries that are chronologically linked to the Mesolithic. Planned lifted settlements with habitats and sanctuaries of the trapezoidal base, necropolises that point to special funeral rituals, monumental stone sculptures and numerous finds of bones and stone testify that this site was not only a settlement, but also a sacral center. At the time when it was discovered, Lepenski Vir was an isolated phenomenon, and this situation did not change significantly until today. Unlike other parts of Europe, in which there are only scarce testimonies of the Mesolithic, remains of Lepenski Vir have been found that enable the complete reconstruction of culture, art and society of that period.

Archaeoastronomical research was also carried out at the site of Lepenski Vir. The first archaeoastronomical surveys were conducted during the winter solstice in 2014. They pointed to the possibility of a double sunrise occurring during the summer solstice. The volcanic hill Treskavac, which is located across the Danube from Lepenski Vir, has a rocky outcropping near the top and an inclination higher than the inclination of the Suns apparent orbit. The Sun appears above Treskavac, then goes behind the outcropping and reappears again. The phenomenon was observed and confirmed during the summer solstice of 2015. The phenomenon was investigated by Pavlović and Aleksandra Bajić, who published their findings in 2016 book The Sun of Lepenski Vir. The results show that the double sunrise was visible from the northernmost part of the settlement. Viewed from the southernmost part, the summer solstice Sun rose on the southern part of the flattened top of Treskavac. So, the whole settlement was accurately measured with respect to the astronomical event.

The people of Lepenski Vir also depicted strange Fish-like Beings in their scupltures. Was this due to the close proximity of the site to river Danube and the sculptures represent some kind of God of the River or maybe even perceived ancestors which were half human, half fish?

For more information about the archeological literature, see Dragoslav Srejović.
PlaceBoljetin
CountrySerbia

points.name: Lepsius-I-Pyramid
points.description:
NameLepsius-I-Pyramid
DescriptionThe base length of the pyramid, according to calculations by archaeologist Nabil M. Swelim, was 215 meters with a planned height of 107.5 to 150.5 meters. Thus, the Lepsius I pyramid was in the same order of magnitude as the Khafre pyramid or possibly even larger, which would make it the largest pyramid in Egypt so far. Whether the structure was to be completed as a stepped pyramid or whether it was planned to be a true pyramid with an exterior cladding is not clear. The pyramid was constructed of simple mud bricks without straw as filler around a large rock core. The courses of the bricks slope inward at 75°-76°, similar to the stone courses of the stepped pyramids of the 3rd Dynasty.

What makes this mighty pyramid a great mystery is the fact that archaeologists do not know exactly when it was built and by whom (it owes its enigmatic name to the Egyptologist Karl Richard Lepsius, who placed it first in his list of pyramids of Egypt). Also, no inscriptions or artifacts have been found that would allow a conclusion to be drawn about the builder. Since it is unique in its characteristics among the Egyptian pyramids, it cannot be easily placed in a context.
PlaceAbu Rawash
CountryEgypt

NameMadsebakke
DescriptionThe Bronze Age (1.800 – 500 BC) rock Carvings Madsebakke are one of the most important carvings in the Nordic region. The Petroglyphs are situated in the northeast of Bornholm near Allinge and Sandvig. Core motiv is the ship (sun ship), 14 of those can be found at Madsebakke next to cup marks, circles and wheel crosses. Could this cup marks represent stars ? As excavation have shown this site has been used thousands of years. The first editing tracks date back to 3.500 BC. There are more Carvings on the Island of Bornholm every one part of the beautiful landscape and every one telling its own story. It is up to us what we see in those ancient pictures.
PlaceAllinge

points.name: Maeshowe
points.description:
NameMaeshowe
DescriptionMaeshowe is a chambered cairn build 2.700 B.C. on the Orkney Islands, Scotland.
It is a very fine example of the architectural skills the megalithic builders had long time ago. The mound of Maeshowe is 7 m high and 35 m in diameter, it has a main chamber (4,7m x 4,7m, 3,8 m high) and 3 side chambers build out of sandstone blocks, the heaviest weighs 3t. In the 12 century A.D., vikings carved 30 inscriptions in the sandstone walls, it is one of the largest collection of runes in Europe. There is a special alignment at Maeshowe, at winter solstice the last sun rays shine through the 11 m long passage, illuminating the main chamber (same as Newgrange, Ireland). It marks the end of the darkest time of the year, when the light is returning again. Another interesting fact is the acoustics at Meshowe, there are parts of extrem high and low sound which have been analyzed by Dr. Aaron Watson. The West Mainland of Orkney has a lot more ancient monuments such as the Standing Stones of Stenness, the Ring of Brodgar and Skara Brae.

Excerpt from http://www.orkneyjar.com:
After repeated visits to measure and record audio data, Dr Watson is of the opinion that sound played an integral part in the rituals and ceremonies surrounding sites such as Maeshowe and the Ring of Brodgar.

His research shows that certain prehistoric monuments exhibit specific sonic effects – effects that would have been impossible for Neolithic man to explain. As such, were they interpreted as having an “otherworldly” source?

At Maeshowe, for example, specific pitches of vocal chant, as well as drumming, inside the cairn produced specific, unsettling, effects in those present.

In the chamber, the behaviour of sound was seen to be considerably different from that of the outside world, with the ancient stone walls amplifying noise to create a variety of audio effects.

One of these effects is the phenomenon known as standing waves. These produce distinct areas of high and low intensity as the sound waves interact – either cancelling each other out, or combining to enhance, the sound.

This effect means that by moving through the chamber, the listener experiences areas of high and low volume that appear to have no relationship to the source of the sound.

.... In Maeshowe, a drum was used and the researchers discovered that the correct frequency was 2 hz. This is an infrasonic frequency which means that, although inaudible to humans, it can be felt as distinct physical, or psychological, sensation.

Test subjects reported the feeling that sounds were emerging from inside their head and body. They experienced feelings of dizziness, nausea, headaches, flying sensations and also that their pulse-rate was being affected.

Dr Watson suggests that prolonged exposure to these sounds could have had a profound effect - an effect that Neolithic man could only ascribe to the supernatural.

So were the tombs built with these scientific phenomena in mind?
PlaceMainland Orkney, Scotland
CountryUnited Kingdom

points.name: Masuda-no-iwafune - Gigantic boulder with perfect carvings - Age unknown
points.description:
NameMasuda-no-iwafune - Gigantic boulder with perfect carvings - Age unknown
DescriptionMasuda-mountain-ship? Ship on Masuda mountain?
The article concerning this monolith was written by Dr. Prof. Ryofu Pussel from Japan for our magazine SAGENHAFTE ZEITEN No. 2/2020. The Monolith has an east-west length of eleven metres, a north-south length of eight metres and a height (measured on the north side surface) of 4.7 metres. You can see a flat, square incision running from the flat surface immediately east to the upper half of the east-west side with a width of 1.8 meters, a depth of 0.4 meters in western direction with a groove in the southern side edge that maintains exactly 90°. What might this have been used for? Particularly striking are the two square holes in the west and east with a distance of four metres. Both have the same dimensions of 1.6 x 1.6 x 1.3 metres.... the weight is estimated 800 tons.
PlaceMasuda no iwafune
CountryJapan

There are no measurements given, but from the scale depicted by the human figures, these megaliths are much larger (as much as 2 to 3 times larger) than the largest known megaliths in the world. (Example: The Pregnant Woman Stone of Baalbek, Lebanon weighs in at approximately 1,260 tons). Some of these megaliths could easily weigh upwards of 3,000 to 4,000 tons. They really dont look as it would derive from a geological process. Hence their are many claims that these stone blocks originate from pre ancient times and a technological advanced civilization.
PlaceGornaya Shoria, Oblast Kemerowo, Russland
CountryRussia

points.name: Melitopol Stone Tomb
points.description:
NameMelitopol Stone Tomb
DescriptionExcerpt from SZ 2/2009, Dr. Oleg Olchowikow:

Ukraine is littered with zmien walls (serpentine earth walls), huge walls heaped up from earth, which by their total length and circumference probably exceed the construction works of the Great Wall of China. Many prehistoric settlements and sacred sites of the ancient peoples of this area, which disappeared into nothingness, are still waiting here for their explorers.

One of these sites, inappropriately named Stone Tomb, is located not far from the city of Melitopol, on the bank of the Molochnaya River. Some researchers believe that this consecrated site would have had another name, Bog-Gora, the God Mountain, even in the times of the Kyiv Old Russia epoch. In the course of thousands of years this land has been shrouded in legends. As Herodotus tells, Heracles is said to have come here in Cimmerian times to perform his heroic deeds; the pugnacious Amazons lived here, and later the royal Scythians buried their kings on this territory. The Celtic legends ascribe to the druid Merlin that he was born in this mystical land, and so it is not surprising that until our present time Brahmins and sensitive people make pilgrimages to the ancient stone tomb.

Excavations indicate that this huge stone mound may be the oldest sanctuary on earth, as the prehistoric site has existed for about 22000 years. On the walls of many caves and grottoes that do not reach very far into the mound, on the altars and ledges formed by nature, our ancestors left rock carvings from long ago. By means of these artistic works they tried to record the events of the fast passing time. It seems that over time, this peculiar archive was also worshipped and venerated by people who lived far outside this area (now called Priazowie).

The petroglyphs, made thousands of years ago, convey information about what our distant ancestors saw and knew. They do not contain distortions of meaning, which inevitably arise in the narrators who pass the traditions from generation to generation. The expeditions of N.I. Vesselovskaya, M.J. Rudinsky, V.N. Danilenko and V.M. Mikhailov, who investigated the Stone Tomb, did a colossal job, excavating the caves and making copies of the petroglyphs.

If one examines the petroglyphs on the walls of the stone tomb more closely, one notices something astonishing: namely, what the orthodox historians prefer to conceal. Thus, an unprejudiced researcher, looking closely at the stone archive of this archaeological monument, is struck first of all by an immense amount of representations, which are apparently based on technological elements. In fact, if we look at the objects and events depicted on the petroglyphs, the result is that their functioning could not have been known at all in the Stone Age or in the Chalcolithic period. The technologies engraved in stone are more comparable to those of the present, and even seem to surpass our present achievements.

The evaluation of the petroglyphs on the walls of the Neolithic stone tomb, which can be considered as an indication for the theory of paleo-Seti contacts, could result in a whole book. Certainly, one can ask whether the enigmatic representations of the stone tomb really reflect those technologies that were secretly observed by our ancestors in arrivals from the cosmos. And, of course, one cannot give a definite answer to this question. But equally one can doubt the interpretations put forward within the framework of traditional theories of the history of primitive societies. But one thing is clear: that the views proclaimed as official cannot ultimately offer a credible alternative when we are confronted with symbols and traditions that are difficult to understand, as we encounter them throughout the earth. The old dogmatic views rather impair the search for truth than contribute to understanding.

The outstanding Ukrainian archaeologist, head of the Museum of Archaeology and Ethnology of the Crimea, Askold Stschepinski, wrote at that time with annoyance in his essay Earth civilization is not unique that the archaeological findings, which speak for the possible visit of the Earth by inhabitants of other planets are unfortunately concealed, because they do not correspond to the paradigm of the existing scientific schools.

Similar like with other worldwide petroglyphs and cave-paintings around the globe, the question remains what our ancient ancestors wanted to communicate or show us with it.
PlaceMelitopol
CountryUkraine

points.name: Midad del Mundo - Center of the Earth, Ecuador
points.description:
NameMidad del Mundo - Center of the Earth, Ecuador
DescriptionIn 1736 modern/scientific geographs tried to fix the exact location of the Equator - they measured wrong - but nearby on a hill top, ancient native ruins exist. There is point zero - the ancient knew....

The placement of the equatorial line was defined throughout a 1736 expedition called the French Geodesic Mission . While such studies would later determine the exact measure and shape of the world, astronomers involved missed the possibility of encountering the reminiscence of highly sophisticated geographical achievements made on “Equatorial” territory for hundreds of years before their arrival. Throughout the time the astronomers attempted to measure a length of a degree of latitude on that part of the planet, a group of different sorts of ruins (built by the Quitu-Cara culture) were found nearby the territory where they thought the Equatorial line passed through. Years after that, it was brought to light that the Geodesic Mission had been wrong about the exact coordinates where the line passed through—the measurements had indeed proved the world was oblate and not elongated (egg-shaped) at the poles, but their studies to define the placement of the equator were incorrect by 240 meters. The ruins found throughout the expedition between 1735-1745 where actually situated at latitude 0, or the exact position where the Equatorial line crosses. ( Wikipedia)
PlaceMitad del Mundo
CountryEcuador
