points.name: Monolithic Churches of Lalibela
points.description:
NameMonolithic Churches of Lalibela
DescriptionThe monolithic Churches of Lalibela are eleven monolithic churches in Ethiopia which are cut directly from the bedrock. The construction is attributed to the 12th century ethiopian King Lalibela form the Zagwe-Dynastie who wanted to create a New-Jerusalem. The constructions are some of the largest monolithic structures around the world. The church Medhani Alem has an astonishing height of 33 meter and is considered the largest monolithic church in the world.
Ancient Legends (reported in the Book The Ethiopian Royal Chronicles by Richard K. P. Pankhurst) tell that when King Lalibela was poisoned by his half-brother, angels carried him to the 1st, 2nd and 3rd Heavens. There, the king saw a city of rock-hewn churches and God commanded him to return to Earth and re-create what he had seen. Similar legends also say that humans and angels co-constructed the churches.

But in the end the question remains what building-techniques the ancient culture(s) used and who these strange beings, called angels , mentioned in the legends, might have been?
PlaceLalibela
CountryEthiopia

points.name: Montevecchia Pyramids
points.description:
NameMontevecchia Pyramids
DescriptionLOMBARDIA (Rovagnate LC) - Pyramids of Montevecchia:
Discovered in 2001 by the architect Vincenzo di Gregorio during an aerial survey of the area inside the Parco del Curone . Since then several studies have been done.
The three hills / pyramids , have remained hidden along the millennia and now are covered with vegetation. The strangest thing comes from the fact that the base, the height and the slope of all three pyramids, is identical to each other.
The three pyramids of Montevecchia, are stepped pyramids, in fact, according to the architect, they were modeled in the limestone rock.
In addition, their orientation is the same as the most famous sisters of Egypt, in perfect alignment with the 3 stars of the belt of Orion (Alnitak, Alnilam, Mintaka).

points.name: Newgrange
points.description:
NameNewgrange
DescriptionFor the last 5,165 years-calculated backward from 2012-to the present day, the same miracle has taken place in Ireland each year. It happens once again in a passage grave - although here, too, a corpse has never materialized. The place is called Newgrange, and it lies 51 kilometers northwest of Dublin or about 15 kilometers west of the town of Drogheda. There, in the county of Meath, in a loop of the river Boyne, the original inhabitants of Ireland set a grandiose memorial into the landscape. It is a technical miracle from the Stone Age. It is not simply a grave surrounded by stones to prevent animals getting at the corpse. Newgrange is a masterpiece of surveying, a lesson in astronomy, and a transport phenomenon. It was built at a time when, according to orthodox archeological opinion, Egyptian history had not yet happened, there was no pyramid on earth, and the cities of Ur, Babylon, or Knossos did not yet exist. Presumably the impressive stone circle of Stonehenge had not yet been planned when unknown astronomers built the passage grave of Newgrange. For thousands of years, no one paid attention to the round hill above the river Boyne, until in 1699, when the road worker Edward Lhwyd swore mightily. A boulder blocking the line of the road would not budge. When it had been half- freed from the earth, the swearing road worker noticed two engraved spirals and some rectangles on the recalcitrant block. Now everything became clear: Another one of those damned graves. The message reached the next pub. Newgrange had been discovered.
Thorough excavations did not begin until the 1960s. In 1969, the lead researcher Professor Michael J. OKelly from Cork University discovered a right-angled artificial opening above the two monoliths at the entrance. It was only 20 centimeters wide, but that was enough for the scholar to see the light. On the day of the winter solstice in 1969 - and again one year later - OKelly seated himself right at the back of the vault. Here is his eye-witness account: Exactly at 9:45, the upper edge of the sun appeared on the horizon, and at 9:58 the first shaft of direct sunlight appeared through the small roofbox above the entrance. The beam of sunlight then lengthened along the passage into the burial chamber until the beam reached the edge of the basin stone in the niche. When the beam of light had widened into a 17-centimeter ribbon and flooded the floor of the chamber, the reflection illuminated the grave so dramatically that various details both of the side chambers and of the vaulted roof could be clearly seen. At 10:04 the ribbon of light began to narrow and precisely at 10:25 the beam of light was abruptly cut off. So for 21 minutes at sunrise on the shortest day of the year sunlight penetrates directly into the burial chamber of Newgrange. Not through the entrance but through a specially constructed narrow slit above the entrance to the passage. As a cautious academic, Professor OKelly did not at the time want to give a final answer to the question whether the light show was accidental or intended. The question has meanwhile been ticked off by others.
PlaceNewgrange
CountryIreland

points.name: Oshiko Shrine Ishi-no-Hoden japanese Rock Shrine
points.description:
NameOshiko Shrine Ishi-no-Hoden japanese Rock Shrine
DescriptionThe Ishi-no-Hoden monolith is located at a shito shrine called Oshiko-jinja in Japan. This huge monolith has an astonishing weight of 500 - 700 metric tons and is around 7 meters wide and 6 meters tall. The monolith is made off Hyaloclastite, a glas-like material that formed around 70 mio. years ago by volcanic eruptions in the water. Strangely, the monolith seems to be floating above a pond of water but its just an optical illusion. Also, no traces of tool machining, known to humans, can be found on the monolith itself, but tool machining traces can be found on the rock below the monolith. Like with many ancient unexplainable sites and artifacts, this one is also associated with legends about the ancient gods, in this case to the legends of the japanese Shinto religion.
One of the legend tells of a god called Amatsu who ordered two gods, Oonamuchi and Sukunahikona, to bring peace to the area where the monolith is located. They were ordered to build a stone palace in just one night. When they were halfway done with the work, another group of gods attacked them, so they could not finish their work. The entrance they built from the monolith, tipped over in west-wast direction. Even though, the two gods could not finish the work, they said that their souls will stay in the monolith for eternity and will bring peace and calmness to the area.

The monolith existed long before the priests of the japanese Shinto-religion began to worship the stone so no one knows for sure what this huge monolith was originaly used for nor how or when it was originaly constructed or created.
PlaceOoshiko-21 Amidacho, Takasago, Hyogo 676-0823, Japan
CountryJapan

points.name: Osiris Shaft
points.description:
NameOsiris Shaft
DescriptionThe Osiris Shaft is one of many shafts on the Giza Plateau. It is situated between the Valley Temple and the Khafre Pyramid the entrance is underneath the Khafre Causeway. In 1933 Selim Hassan discovered this shaft, at this time the lower part was flooded with water. In 1999 Zahi Hawass did a full scale excavation ( FOX TV Opening the last tobs) and they pumped out the water. There are 3 shafts and 3 chambers up to a depth of 30m. These shafts and chambers were carved out of the bedrock, one can still see the parallel working marks ( very similar to a lot of ancient places all over the world).The first chamber in 4m depth measures 2,5 x 6m. The second chamber is 14m deeper below and has 6 niches in two of them precisely cutted stone sarcophagi can be found. One is made out of dacit, which cannot be found in Egypt. How did they transport and move them into this chamber? The second sarcophagus is made out of red granite and behind it there is supposed to be a tunnel leading in the direction of the Sphinx. Today the tunnel is not visible because the entrance is blocked by the sarcophagus. The 3rd chamber in a depth of 30m is unfortunately floodet with water today. One can barely see a lid of a massive granite sarcophagus. In the middle oft the chamber a rectangular structure is carved out of the bedrock with the granite sarcophagus in the centre, 4 columns once surrounded the structure. In the eastern wall there is a tunnel in the direction of the Khufu Pyramid. This tunnel is yet not completely discovered because the tunnel narrows ( 40x40cm) after a few meters. Today the tunnel is also flooded and no further exploration takes place. In his Histories Book II Herodotus describes a very similar shaft system wich was known as the tomb of Khufu. The astonishing Osiris Shaft is just one of many shafts on the Giza Plateau a lot of mysterys are waiting to be hopefully one day discovered.
PlaceGiza
CountryEgypt

points.name: Petrified dino and human tracks in the same sediment level
points.description:
NamePetrified dino and human tracks in the same sediment level
DescriptionDinosaurs and giant human tracks were found 1908 in the dry bed of the Paluxy river. Both footprints were pressed in the same lime stone layer. How can that be, according to official history Dinosaurs died out long time before humans existed?
PlaceGlen Rose Texas
CountryUnited States

points.name: Stonehenge
points.description:
NameStonehenge
DescriptionStonehenge is one of the world top well known mysteries. Many thesis or alleged facts and also rumors exist, its a difficult task if you have to decide, what is a fact and what is fiction or really evident from countless sources.

In mainstream science it can still be said up to this date that no final evidence exists for what purpose Stonehenge has been built nor how it has been built including the transportation of the stones. 1952 the godfather of radio carbon-14 radioisotope dating method Willard Libby from the University of Chicago has found a piece of charred oak from an excavated pit at Stonehenge dating Stonehenge at around ~4000 B.C (3800 years old, plus or minus 275 years). As archeologists have found nearby remains of bones in the pits called the 56 Aubrey Holes an accepted purpose of the site is alleged to be a burial site. Nonetheless both facts, the dating and proposed purpose as a burial site could be wrong. The Ludwig Boltzman Institute - Archeological Prospection and Virtual Archeology did a magnetometry at Stonehenge dating human activity starting at 10000 years ago.

At Mindspectra they propose a planetary constellation of Stonhenge on circles or the different levels of the radius at the site, as shown in the pictures of Mindspectra.de, beginning with the moon, Mercury, Mars, Venus and earth.
Maria Wheatley narrates about Dr. Aubrey Burl, who describes in his work or book A Brief History of Stonehenge, that the stones also have a particular alignment to lunar cycles. Also Gerald Hawkins, a professor of astronomy at Boston University in the 1960s proposed the Aubrey Holes depict a lunar cycle in described in his book Stonehenge Decoded. Wikipedia: Hawkins theory was that three 18.61 year cycles multiply out to 55.83, which is much closer to an integer and therefore easier to mark using 56 holes. Hawkins argued that the Aubrey Holes were used to keep track of this long time period and could accurately predict the recurrence of a lunar eclipse on the same azimuth, that which aligned with the Heel Stone, every 56 years. Going further, by placing marker stones at the ninth, eighteenth, twenty-eighth, thirty-seventh, forty-sixth and fifty sixth holes, Hawkins deduced that other intermediate lunar eclipses could also be predicted.

Furthermore Maria Wheatley mentions that the Stonehenge is surrounded by ~16 military sites, the GB area 51 which also encounters many crop circles occurrences and UFO sightings.

Maria Wheatley also concludes in her presentation and book The Elongated Skulls of Stonehenge, that the nearby found skeletons with elongated skulls are people related to several sites in these area, also to the elongated mounds. The remnants of the people with elongated skulls are a great mystery, who were they, from where and why are their skulls elongated?

Upon Geoffrey of Monmouth (1095 – c. 1155) a cleric and major chronicler of GB wrote in the twelfth-century Historia Regum Britanniae (History of the Kings of Britain):
From iversity.org:
The legend of King Arthur provides another story of the construction of Stonehenge. It is told by the twelfth century writer, Geoffrey of Monmouth, in his History of the Kings of Britain that Merlin brought the stones to the Salisbury Plain from Ireland. Sometime in the fifth century, there had been a massacre of 300 British noblemen by the treacherous Saxon leader, Hengest. Geoffrey tells us that the high king, Aurelius Ambrosius, wanted to create a fitting memorial to the slain men. Merlin suggested an expedition to Ireland for the purpose of transplanting the Giants Ring stone circle to Britain. According to Geoffrey of Monmouth, the stones of the Giants Ring were originally brought from Africa to Ireland by giants (who else but giants could handle the job?). The stones were located on Mount Killaraus and were used as a site for performing rituals and for healing. Led by King Uther and Merlin, the expedition arrived at the spot in Ireland. The Britons, none of whom were giants, apparently, were unsuccessful in their attempts to move the great stones. At this point, Merlin realized that only his magic arts would turn the trick. So, they were dismantled and shipped back to Britain where they were set up (see illus. at right) as they had been before, in a great circle, around the mass grave of the murdered noblemen. The story goes on to tell that Aurelius, Uther and Arthurs successor, Constantine were also buried there in their time*.

A famous story or rather rumor is the disappearance of five tourist or so called hippies, who visited Stonehenge in 1971 and then disappeared. The claimed names of the hippies were: Ms. Julia Ashton, Mr. Lucas Addams, Ms. Shary Wilson Jr., Mr. Danniel Wilson, Ms. Wilma Rupert. Some ufologists believe Ms. Wilma Rupert was a psychic and in touch with the UFO or aliens. However this story probably originated in the 70s TV series Quatermass titled episode Ringstone Round by professor Quatermass and there seems no existing evidence that proof this story true. If it were true many statements and interviews of local involved relatives should exist.

Last but not least a crop circle occured near Stonehenge on the 8th of July 1996 called Julia Set. This crop circle occured extremely fast by daylight and couldnt be explained. It consisted of 149 circles and each circle had an own center. It was 279m in diameter and witnesses like a pilot or nearby security man at Stonehenge did verify that the crop circle didnt exist some hours before.
PlaceSalisbury Plain
CountryUnited Kingdom

points.name: Puma Punku
points.description:
NamePuma Punku
DescriptionWhen the first conquerors saw Puma Punku, with its gigantic platforms and detailed chiseling’s - they asked the natives, who built such constructions - the Spanish were not able to do a such work at that time. The answer: The Gods built this place in only one night. The Aymaras at that time had no writings, but the blocks are calculated and cutted as high technology.
PlaceTiawanacu, Bolivia
CountryBolivia

points.name: Pyramides of Güimar, Tenerife, Spain
points.description:
NamePyramides of Güimar, Tenerife, Spain
DescriptionWE HAVE TO CHECK IF THIS MYSTERY STILL MEET OUR CRITERIA FOR A VALID POI?!? OTHERWISE WE HAVE TO REMOVE IT!!!
The pyramides of Güimar are another strange place located on the isle of Tenerife in Spain. The pyramids are so called step-pyramids and archaeologists presume that they were built by the mysterious culture of the Guanches. They bear a great similarity to step-pyramids on other canary-islands and even other countries around the globe. These pyramids are aligned to certain astronomical phenomenons. They are roughly dated to around 3000 b.C. Also, strange artifacts have been discovered under and around the pyramids of Güimar like strange stone-spheres and figurines. Also, many petroglyphs have been discovered on the canary islands.
PlaceGüimar
CountrySpain

points.name: Ramses 2 Statue
points.description:
NameRamses 2 Statue
DescriptionThe Ramesseum is well over 3000 years old. The temple also contains different very heavy remains of statues, the largest found one is from Ramses 2, wars have destroyed the huge statue that has been carved out of one single stone, but some fragments have remained. Erich von Däniken states that measurements of the original statue gave a weight of 1200 tons, the stones have been transported 600 kilometeres away from the Mokkatam Hills.

Up to date it is not clear how these stones or statue have been transported and how this task has been accomplished with the methods and engineerings skills back then. For better understanding the following example is given, to give an impression, what labour and engineering skills must have been available back then. As example the relocation project of the Abu Simbel Temple is given. The Abu Simbel had to be relocated during the building process of the Aswan Dam. Multiple countries were involved in the planning and relocation project. 3000 measurements were made for the relocation plan and all parts of the temple, including statues as well, had to be cut into many parts. It was a giant challenge to accomplish. Also the most powerful cranes of the world were challenged as the cranes stock capabilities were maxed out and further assistance through machinery with hydraulic technology was required to achieve the goal. Now the question arises how the people over 3000 years ago did achieve this incredible task, where no hydraulic assisted super powerful cranes existed.

Dr. Erich von Däniken points out and emphasizes that the transportation and entire building process of the Rames 2 statue was an impossible task to accomplish back in these ages where people lived in simple houses, in consideration with their engineering skills, level and technology available back then. Hence there must have been a kind of knowledge transfer to the ancient people, how to plan and construct. The possibility is given, that the information how to plan and construct at this level of engineering has been given from extra terrestrials, as well do countless stories exist in different cultures, how knowledge from so called gods or other beings has been transfered to humans. Until we dont know for sure how this extremely heavy statue has been transported back then and the possibility exists for real, that extra terrestrials may have been involved, it remains a great mystery.
PlaceEdfo, Luxor Governorate, Egypt
CountryEgypt

points.name: Red Pyramid of Sneferu (father of Cheops)
points.description:
NameRed Pyramid of Sneferu (father of Cheops)
DescriptionCheops father was called Sneferu and was presumably older than his son. This Pharaoh Sneferu (2575-2551 BC) had a pyramid built in Dahshur, among other things. From the outside, it looks like a pile of boulders - as if the structure had stood in the water for decades. What is inside this mountain of rubble? A Grand Gallery, with granite blocks arranged on top of one another, like that of his son Cheops. -From Erich von Däniken, Remnant of the Gods, 2012
PlaceDahsur Red Pyramid
CountryEgypt

points.name: Ring of Brodgar
points.description:
NameRing of Brodgar
DescriptionThe ring of Brodgar belongs with 104 meters in diameter to the 3 largest stone henges in the U.K, its even larger than the famous stonehenge in Salisbury. From the original 60 stones one third is still remaining. Its astronomically aligned to the mid-winter solstice and moon-cycles. Allegedly the site is around 4500 years old. Invaders from Scandinavia reached Orkney by the 9th century, bringing a complex theology that they imposed on the preexisting Orcadian monuments; at least according to local legend. For example, the Ring of Brodgar and the Standing Stones of Stenness were allegedly known as the Temple of the Sun and Moon respectively. Also the Site is aligned through a temple called Ness of Brodgar onto another stone circle called Stones of Stenness. It remains a mystery how and why they truely built this sites.

Excerpt from Kasten Megan Thesis:
The Ring of Brodgar was built sometime between 2500 and 2000 B.C. (Orkneyjar 2012)
and still retains many of its original stones. Twenty-seven are still standing, and the positions of
thirteen others are known. If the stones were equally spaced, there were probably around sixty
stones erected originally. It is encircled by a henge as well, but there are two entrances that cross
this henge. It has been calculated that the ditch on its own would have taken at least 80,000 man
hours, equivalent to at least forty people working for ten years (MacSween and Sharp 1990).
PlaceStenness - Orkney Islands, Scottland
Countrynull

points.name: Rollright stone circle - Radiation abnomalies with Geiger counter and infrared monitor
points.description:
NameRollright stone circle - Radiation abnomalies with Geiger counter and infrared monitor
DescriptionExcerpt from theaveburyexperience.co.uk:
The Rollright Ring is a Late Neolithic stone circle of oolitic limestone nestled in a copse on the Oxfordshire and Warwickshire border. The stone ring is a perfect circle of around 72 or so stones, although legend says the stones cannot be counted! Originally, there may have been around 100 stones, standing shoulder to shoulder, creating an almost wall-like enclosure. There was once an avenue or at least four portal stones that stood just outside of the circle forming a processional way and entrance into the stone circle.

In the 1970s, The Dragon Project found that the country lane running by the Rollright stone circle had abnormally high Geiger counts along a few hundred metres stretch. The Dragon Project was monitoring the fast moving beta particle counts, which are natural radiations from the earth due to disintegration of atomic nuclei by cosmic ray bombardments.

On several occasions my late father dowsed the lane and located an intense area of radiation - a ‘hot-spot’. He carefully used dowsing to count the exact emissions and claimed gamma radiation was being detected. In 1996 the late Art Brickell and Geoff Woolford checked his dowsing results and the radioactive ‘hot-spot’, measuring for the gamma ray counts per minute with a gamma ray radiation monitor.

Radiation and the ‘Spook Road’
The gamma ray radiation monitor revealed the measurements which were taken along the adjacent road to the Rollright Ring following the dowsing results. The normal background count for the region is 60–80 counts per minute. Our findings revealed huge differences ranging from a cold spot of 71 to a high spot of 302. The results were significant and also confirmed that my late father’s dowsing was as accurate as a Geiger counter.

One intriguing anomaly was noted in 1979 at the Rollright stone circle, Oxfordshire. Infrared photographs of the outlying King Stone showed an apparent hazy glow around the crest of the standing stone
PlaceLong Compton
CountryUnited Kingdom

points.name: Sacred Fountain of Santa Cristina
points.description:
NameSacred Fountain of Santa Cristina
DescriptionThe sacred fountain of Santa Cristina is a very unique construction from the late neolithic period. It almost looks like a modern construction and is astronomicaly aligned to the moon and the sun. Every 18.5 years, the light of the moon illuminates the waterpond at the bottom of the fountain. Also at certain times, the sun creates a spectacular lasershow at the edges of the stones. The late neolithic creators of this site certainly had very advanced engineering skills and a profound knowledge of astronomical events.
Researcher Arnold Lebeuf did extensive research about the astronomical alignments of this site, especialy about the lunar-calender alignment and wrote some scientific whitepapers about the topic.

Some researchers propose that the moon played an important role in ancient cultures,. The ancients observed how the moon affected the tides and by tracking it alongside of the sun, they developed calendars to predict agricultural rhythms. Even today, farmers plant seeds during certain phases of the moon cycle. It is believed that moisture is pulled toward the top layer of the soil and improves germination. But could there also have been more profound reasons to track the moon- and the sun- cycles in ancient times and why was the sacred fountain of Santa Cristina built with such an elaborate construction technique?
PlaceSanta Cristina
CountryItaly

points.name: Sacsayhuaman
points.description:
NameSacsayhuaman
Description- Megalithic stone wall of gigantic blocks, facing upward, sensless for defending reasons.
- Uncountable, unexplanable stone cuttings all over!
PlaceSacsayhuman, Cuzco, Peru
CountryPeru

points.name: San Agustin Colombia
points.description:
NameSan Agustin Colombia
DescriptionIn addition to its Christian pilgrimage shrines, Colombia also has an important pre-Colombian ceremonial center called San Augustin. Considered by archaeologists to be one of the most significant ancient places in Latin America, San Augustin is actually a collection of ceremonial and burial sites scattered over an area of 250 square miles. Little is known of San Augustin. In particular, who were the people that lived here, where did they come from, when did they arrive, and what was the purpose of the extraordinary stone figures they so expertly carved? None of these questions can be answered with any degree of certainty. Scholars have hypothesized that an archaic people settled in the rolling hills bordering the Magdalena River as early as 3300 BC. These shadowy people may possibly have been the ancestors of the stone carvers who produced more than 500 monolithic statues, sarcophagi and petroglyphs sometime between the 6th and 14th centuries.
PlaceSan Agustin
CountryColombia

points.name: Sanxingdui culture and archaeological site in China
points.description:
NameSanxingdui culture and archaeological site in China
DescriptionSanxingdui (Three Star Mound) is the name of an archaeological site and a major Bronze Age culture in modern Guanghan, Sichuan, China. Largely discovered in 1986, following a preliminary finding in 1929, archaeologists excavated remarkable artifacts that radiocarbon dating placed in the 12th–11th centuries BC. The type site for the Sanxingdui culture that produced these artifacts, archeologists have identified the locale with the ancient kingdom of Shu. The artifacts are displayed in the Sanxingdui Museum located near the city of Guanghan.
Ancient chinese texts describe the first regent Can Cong of the Shu-kingdom with great detail.
Researcher Alexander Knörr wrote in Sagenhafte Zeiten Issue No. 4/2018 about the Sanxingdui-culture and the legendary figur called Can Cong. Where Can Cong came from, no one knows. He appeared when the people of the region knew neither writing, nor rituals, nor higher culture. He ruled for several hundred years until about the time when Sanxingdui was abruptly abandoned. According to ancient chinese legends (Handbook of Chinese Mythology, Oxford University Press), he had golden silkworms in his luggage, of which he gave one to each family. Can Cong taught silkworm breeding and everything related to silk. The golden silkworms had to be returned to Can Cong when normal silkworms came out of them. Can Cong had strikingly strange eyes, according to ancient texts. In the Treatise on the Huayang State (compiled around 300 A.D.), the eyes of the culture-bringer are described just as we can see them on three of the bronze masks excavated at Sanxingdui: protruding, cylindrical eyes that protrude horizontally from the face. Can Cong was widely known as Zong Mu Zhi Ren, The Man with the Horizontally Protruding Eyes, and was mentioned and described as such in several ancient Chinese writings.

The questions here are the same like with many other ancient cultures around the globe. What did they try to depict with these masks and figurines and what do the ancient legends try to convey to us?
PlaceGuanghan, Sichuan, China
CountryChina

points.name: Serapheum underground tunnels with gigantic sarcophaguses
points.description:
NameSerapheum underground tunnels with gigantic sarcophaguses
DescriptionGigantic sarcophaguses where found by Auguste Mariette filled with bitumen and caked-in, they found broken bones from several different animals. But why such gigantic works (Tunnels, bottom and lid of stones up to 40 tons) for broken bones? The perfect cut of these blocks is not explainable with the assumed technology of that time. Also these giants were transported from the quarry in Assuan, which is 1000 kilometers up the Nile.
PlaceSaqqara, Serapheum
CountryEgypt

points.name: Serbian Pyramid Mountain Rtanj
points.description:
NameSerbian Pyramid Mountain Rtanj
DescriptionRtanj is a mountain situated in eastern Serbia, approximately 200 km southeast of Belgrade, between towns of Boljevac on north and Sokobanja on south. It belongs to the Serbian Carpathians. Its highest peak is Šiljak (1,565 m), a natural phenomenon of karst terrain. Most popular theory is that, due to its shape and other observed factors (precise pyramidal geometry, golden ratio math, wondrous natural life, strong electromagnetism with fine frequencies, endemic plants, healthy energy radiation, special climate, mystical cultural heritage, naturally radiation-ionized air, Tesla waves), the mountain had to be artificially built or at least has been used for some specific purposes. Claims are made that it is a multi-dimensional portal, that a channel leads from the top of the mountain to below the ground being used as a launch pad for alien space ships and that Rtanj is an oscillator and resonator of the subtle energy hubs. For some New Age believers, the pyramidal shape of the mountain is due to it containing an alien pyramid emitting mystical energies. Many people have flocked here prior to the predicted 2012 Mayan Doomsday, believing it will protect them.
PlaceRtanj Mountain
CountrySerbia

points.name: Sete Cidades
points.description:
NameSete Cidades
DescriptionInteresting shaped stone hills. Officially: Natural Lava Stones. But the structure looks like artificially shaped. Many cave paintings related to the cosmos. There is more to find out about that.
PlaceSete Cidades, Piripiri, Brazil
CountryBrazil

points.name: Seychelles Prehistoric Rock Processing
points.description:
NameSeychelles Prehistoric Rock Processing
DescriptionResearcher Dieter Pohl found strange prehistoric rock-processing at different locations on the Seychelles islands. In the magazine Sagenhafte Zeiten Issue No. 1/2012, Dieter Pohl reports that in various places on La Digue, the rocks have been stripped down to the waters edge. These traces are still clearly visible. These are cut ends that run out finely (the groove one to two millimeters). The grooves look as if one had cut with a razor blade into a piece of wood, but here granite! This places may be linked to other places around the world where elaborate stone processing took place in ancient times. It s still a mystery what these ancient processed rocks may have been used for or what kind of technology was used to work with this very hard rock material.

Dieter Pohl makes an interesting connection to ancient traditions which have amazing things to tell about stone working under King Solomon, who lived about three thousand years ago. This king is said to have had a tool, the so called miraculous Shamir stonecutter with which he could work on stones, cut and even drill through rocks. He is said to have received this tool from so-called visitors of the gods. In our Sources-Section you find informations about the King Solomon and the mysterious Shamir stonecutter. If one assumes that superior earth visitors or the representatives of an early advanced civilization possessed a technology with which stone (granite) could be worked at will, then the legacies on the Seychelles would be explainable.

In many ancient cultures we see absolutely incredible stone work which we, in our modern culture, could only achieve with the most modern machines. But how did they manage to do it in ancient times were allegedly no high-tech machines existed?
PlaceSeychelles La Digue
Countrynull

points.name: Snake Rock Shrine
points.description:
NameSnake Rock Shrine
DescriptionPrehistoric Snake Rock Shrine found in Bulgaria in 2016. According to Prof. Ana Raduncheva and Assoc. Prof. Stefanka Ivanova from the National Institue and Museum of Archeology in Sofia, another Rockshrine (Eagle s Rocks Shrine) was the work of a prehistoric Civilization which created an entire system of shrines in Bulgaria spanning what was a huge holy territory. The Eagle s Rocks-Shrine which is located in the same Region features huge Human Faces hewn high into the rocks, and dates back to the 4th millennium BC. It s plausible to assume that the Snake-Rock-Shrine was build around the same Time. But only further analysis of the Site will give more clear answers.
PlaceSarnitsa, Minaralni Bani Municipality, Haskovo District, Southern Bulgaria
CountryBulgaria

points.name: Son Real, Spain
points.description:
NameSon Real, Spain
DescriptionNecropolis?
On the east coast of Mallorca, a few kilometers south of Alcudia is the site of Son Real. According to the official sign of the Spanish authorities, it is an overground cementery. There is nearly nothing known about it. The origin according to Wikipedia should have been between 650 - 300 BC. If you follow the Mallorca magazine, more than 300 skeletons have been found and a 4500-year-old burial cave was found nearby. It is quite possible that they are graves. But why put a cemetery about 20 meters from the shore. Even at that time, people must have been aware that there are occasional stormy seas and all graves would be overflooded. When did the sea levels have risen. You can also find cuttings in the bedrock.
PlaceSon Real
CountrySpain

points.name: Stone Sphere world wide - Russia, Arctica
points.description:
NameStone Sphere world wide - Russia, Arctica
DescriptionPerfect round shaped stone balls up to 15 tons were found (and will be found) worldwide. Costa Rica, Guatemala, Easter Island, Ecuador, Artic Islands, New Zealand, and many places more around our planet. For what reason were they made - and brought to their special places? Did nature construct such perfect balls, and were they worshiped by the natives - placed on sanctuary spots? Or are they artificially made?
PlaceNowaja Semlja Insel
CountryRussia

points.name: Tall el-Hammam
points.description:
NameTall el-Hammam
DescriptionBiblical city Sodom & Tunguska event connection?

Excerpt from timesofisrael.com:
3700 years ago all human civilization abruptly ended on the banks of the Dead Sea. Now a team of multi-disciplinary scientists have new evidence which support the theory that a same or similar event happened at the banks of the Dead Sea as in Taiga forestry in Tunguska a 100 years ago in 1908, which is also regarded as a unsolved mystery. In Tunguska around 2000 square kilometers of forest have been wiped out through some kind of explosion, but without leaving a crater which is rather unusual.

As reported in Science News, at the recently concluded Denver-based ASOR Annual Meeting, director of scientific analysis at Jordan’s Tall el-Hammam Excavation Project Phillip J. Silvia presented a paper, “The 3.7kaBP Middle Ghor Event: Catastrophic Termination of a Bronze Age Civilization” during a session on Environmental Archaeology of the Ancient Near East.

Could this massive disaster offer an explanation for the biblical story of Sodom?

According to a 2013 Biblical Archaeology Review article by TeHEP co-director Dr. Steven Collins, the Tall el-Hammam site is a strong candidate for the biblical city of Sodom due to a multitude of factors. The discovered disaster, and its precise location, which he ties to biblical references of “ha-kikkar” (or idiomatically, the plain).
PlaceTall el-Hammam
CountryJordan

points.name: Taygetos Pyramid Profitis Ilias
points.description:
NameTaygetos Pyramid Profitis Ilias
DescriptionPyramid shaped mountain. Highest mountain of Peloponnese 2404m. The pyramid form is about 150m high, similar to Cheops Pyramid in Egypt. Regianol legends say this was the first pyramid on earth. It is located on a line with Thalames (also Pyramid Mountain and ancient orakle)-Taygetos pyramid-Mystras-ION-Stymfalia-Kyllini mountains (2nd highest mountains on Peloponnese)-Delphi. So it could be used to navigate to Delphi by air.
PlaceProfitis Ilias, Taygetos Mountains

points.name: Teotihuacan
points.description:
NameTeotihuacan
DescriptionBuildings and huge pyramids placed in the correct distances of the planets of our solar system (incl. Pluto) flank La Avenida de los Muertos (Avenue of the dead) - From the lower side the view up to the moon pyramid, looks like a 2 km long stairway. From the other end ON the moon pyramid, you can only see a very long street. Even the asteriod belt is marked with a small creek crossing the Avenida under it. Teotihuacan means: The place where the gods met or The place where the gods are burried. Mexican archeologists found big tunnels in front of the Quetzalcoatl-Temple. These tunnels are filled with earth and a small robot now discovered megalithic blocking stones. Do here lie the burried gods? And where does this astronomical knowledge come from?
PlaceTeotihuacan, near Mexico City
CountryMexico

points.name: The Gnappstein
points.description:
NameThe Gnappstein
DescriptionAstronomical alignements made of erratic blocks - lift of heavy weight boulders.
This is what the official site knows about this stone. It is one representative of many erratic boulders in the Solothurn region of Switzerland. Many of these boulders were aligned according to astronomical aspects. In the case of this floating stone - because that is the impression it gives to every visitor - what is more surprising is the technology used to lift and move the
18.3 ton block. This weight results from the 3D model created as part of the RamaR 3D project. A total volume of 6.55 cubic metres, at a specific weight of 2.8 tons per cubic metre of granite, gives a total weight of 18,340 kg. And that is a rather slender representative there..
PlaceSolothurn, Switzerland
CountrySwitzerland

points.name: Thutmose I Obelisk at Karnak temple
points.description:
NameThutmose I Obelisk at Karnak temple
DescriptionThe obelisk at Karnak of Thutmose I weighs a staggering 400 tons at a height of over 30 meters and is carved out of one single piece of stone. It is written at Wikipedia that obelisks in Egypt have been transported on a specially designed barge and moved with sand and ropes. This thesis is still scrutinized and challenged by Erich von Däniken with the following real world facts in regard with the relocation of the Abu Simbel temple, which has been moved only around 180 meters.

Up to date it is not clear how these stones or obelisks have been transported and how this task has been accomplished with the methods and engineerings skills back then. For better understanding the following example is given, to give an impression, what labour and engineering skills must have been available back then. As example the relocation project of the Abu Simbel Temple is given. The Abu Simbel had to be relocated during the building process of the Aswan Dam. Multiple countries were involved in the planning and relocation project. 3000 measurements were made for the relocation plan and all parts of the temple, including statues as well, had to be cut into many parts. It was a giant challenge to accomplish. Also the most powerful cranes of the world were challenged as the cranes stock capabilities were maxed out and further assistance through machinery with hydraulic technology was required to achieve the goal. Now the question arises how the people over 3000 years ago did achieve this incredible task, where no hydraulic assisted super powerful cranes existed.

Dr. Erich von Däniken points out and emphasizes that the transportation and entire building process of the obelisk was an impossible task to accomplish back in these ages where people lived in simple houses, in consideration with their engineering skills, level and technology available back then. Hence there must have been a kind of knowledge transfer to the ancient people, how to plan and construct. The possibility is given, that the information how to plan and construct at this level of engineering has been given from extra terrestrials, as well do countless stories exist in different cultures, how knowledge from so called gods or other beings has been transfered to humans. Until we dont know for sure how these extremely heavy obelisks have been transported back then or how they managed to aquire the necessary knowledge and the possibility exists for real, that extra terrestrials may have been involved, it remains a great mystery.
PlaceKarnak, Luxor, Luxor Governorate, Ägypten
CountryEgypt

points.name: Tiahuanaco
points.description:
NameTiahuanaco
DescriptionThis temple complex is linked to the mysteries of Puma Punku and the Titicaca Lake. According to old American native traditions (incl. Hopi), this was one of the first cities on that continent which was at that time raising out of the sea, while their old home, sank into the Pacific Ocean . Why do we find the most evolved technological evidence in South America, if they officially tell us, the American natives came over the North passage...?
PlaceTiawanacu, Departamento La Paz, Bolivien
CountryBolivia

points.name: Tikal - the place where the Gods landed
points.description:
NameTikal - the place where the Gods landed
DescriptionOne of the biggest Maya cities, built on a place without water. Why to build a city here and constructing 30 km channels to the Peten Itza Lake? According to the Legends and recovered inscriptions, because the gods once landed here.
PlaceTikal, Peten, Guatemala
CountryGuatemala

points.name: Tiryns - Megalitic walls in Mycenaean style
points.description:
NameTiryns - Megalitic walls in Mycenaean style
DescriptionThese megalithic ruins of the fortress of Tiryns are older than the nearby Mycenae. The coast line was close to the walls in ancient times. 3000 BC Tiryns was a economical center of the Pelepones. According to the legend it was built by giants, which Proitos the founder, ordered from Lycia.
PlaceTyrins
CountryGreece

points.description:
NameTunguska Event

PlaceStony Tunguska River, in Yeniseysk Governorate now Krasnoya
CountryRussia

points.name: Turtle formation - megalithic structure in Switzerland
points.description:
NameTurtle formation - megalithic structure in Switzerland
DescriptionThe “Schildchrott” (turtle) is an impressive formation of two stones of different sizes. Both rest on a base of native Jurassic limestone, with the larger one supporting the smaller “turtle head” in such a way that the latter is kept balanced since thousands of years.
We photogrammetrically scanned this formation in winter 2021, without foliage. From this footage, a 3D model was created with the exact volume data from which the weights can be calculated. With the “turtle” we now have a discrepancy of +/- 5 mm. With the new analyses, our 3D specialist Boris Ambiel was able to calculate the cubature (the geometrically measurable volume). The “turtle body” has a total volume of 59.938 m3. With an average weight of about 2.8 t/m3 of granite – the erratic blocks come from the lower Rohne Massif (Canton Valais) 200 kilometres away – we get a total weight of 167.8 tonnes! The considerably smaller head still measures 8.679 m3 and thus weights 24.3 tonnes. These are respectable figures if we assume that these stones were placed, or rather arranged, by our fur-covered ancestors. There is something missing in our historiography. The image of the “Stone Age man” must be revised. We owe that to our ancestors. The astronomical orientation is a further indication of the high level of knowledge in prehistoric times.

On the other hand, we noticed on the drone pictures that the head protrudes at an angle of about 100 degrees SSW to the body. This also makes the explanation that a glacier deposited it this way by coincidence absurd. The smaller block would have slipped away under the larger one and would have fallen out of the artificial suspension. Here, connection points and exact friction surfaces were meticulously tested out.

Georg Brunner (+) proved this mathematically and precisely with the Erdmannlistein in Wohlen, Canton Aargau.

In my opinion, the giants were placed on plinths of native rock. A soil survey could provide evidence as to whether the pedestals are connected to the parent rock or have been artificially added/underlaid. Initial photo analysis suggests that they are not connected to the parent rock.
We do not believe that this and many other prehistoric arrangements were designed by extraterrestrials. We are all the more interested in the question behind it: If it is man-made, i.e. not of natural origin, then: how in “Odins name” did they move these colossi? If we assume, for example, that a hemp rope can withstand about three tonnes, depending on its strength, then it would take 56 such ropes to move 168 tonnes. And if not lifted, but rolled onto the “mound of earth” (which was then removed again) with wooden rollers: What tree can withstand a weight of 168 tons? For me, some things are still inconclusive, and I would like to discuss this topic with other specialists, because I have a few critical questions. The answers could also be of interest for other megalithic structures around the world that are the focus of palaeo-SETI research.
Furthermore, we intend to contact the stone museum in Solothurn (the only one in Switzerland) as well as the Solothurn cantonal archaeologists and make our data available to them. It is not a question of proving the mystery for better or worse, but in cooperation with specialists we would like to gain clarity and at the same time stimulate curiosity for the spectacular “not yet explained” on our doorstep.

Perhaps we will find a sponsor for the stone museum – the 3D models could be displayed on a large touchscreen TV, and the visitor could virtually rotate the stone or formation as desired. A walk to the original in the forest (30 minutes walk) could motivate people to get to know their own region and go in search of explanations or support deeper research.
Excerpt from an article of Ramon Zürcher, PA to Erich von Däniken, in SAGENHAFTE ZEITEN (Legendary Times) 4/2021
PlaceSolothurn, Switzerland
CountrySwitzerland

points.name: UFO mysteriy entrance in underground
points.description:
NameUFO mysteriy entrance in underground
DescriptionI found this 2 objects by google earth. There is something looks like a flying saucer. Near of it the is a mystery entrance going in underground. No streets are located nearby of this two sites! Some people meaned that this a closed öl station. But I don`t think so because my discovery is not connected to any street!!
PlaceUfo and entrance
CountryUnited States

points.name: Underground cities in Turkey - Kaymakli and Derinkuyu
points.description:
NameUnderground cities in Turkey - Kaymakli and Derinkuyu
DescriptionUnderground cities in ancient Turkey. Up to 30 different tunnel systems (cities) were located in that region. Derinkuyu and Kaimakli are the one which are open for the tourists. Why was it necessary to fly underground? The cities were even connected with up to 10 km long tunnels, round blocking stones are standing on strategical doorways. What was the purpose for such constructions.
PlaceBayramlı, 50700 Derinkuyu/Nevşehir, Turkey
CountryTurkey

points.name: Underground tunnels (Erdställe)
points.description:
NameUnderground tunnels (Erdställe)
DescriptionIn Austria, especially in Styria 800 underground tunnels called ”Erdställe” have been found. These tunnels are also known as Souterrains. In Brittany (France) 200 have been found and even 3.000 in Ireland .These tunnels are very puzzling, although there are so many, the purpose and time of origin is still unknown. Based on the finds in the tunnels, science dates them to 11th- 13th century. But they could be much older. In the 16th century many of them were sealed with stones and mud, one was afraid of the pagan belief associated with the tunnels. Very intriguing is the find of two black stones in one of the tunnels in Austria, in sunlight they turn blue, sometimes they glow properly. Also puzzling are the underground ring structures, one found in Styria was 8m in diameter and build up from two walls, filled with Quartz sand. What for? Some tunnels were carved out of the hard bedrock (Gneiss), there you can see machining marks, that run parallel, the surface is glazed. Who was able cut such hard stone so precisely? Once again someone was doing an enormous amount of work to create these underground tunnels, which can be found worldwide. In almost all ancient cultures there are myths and legends that tell of an underground world. Maybe some of these underground structures could be some kind of ancient lost technology which used the earth energy to work as transmitter and receiver? In fact, we still don’t know.
PlaceVorau Styria (Strebl-Gang)
CountryAustria

points.name: Underwater monolith 60 Km offshore from Sicily
points.description:
NameUnderwater monolith 60 Km offshore from Sicily
DescriptionDuring a high-resolution mapping of the seafloor surrounding Sicily in 2015, researchers discovered an ancient treasure: a stone monolith spanning 12 meters, resting on the bottom of the Mediterranean sea. The monolith was discovered 40 metres below sea level on what was once an island called Pantelleria Vecchia Bank in the Sicilian Channel. And even before this time a land bridge between todays Italy and Africa.
The later island was submerged during a flood 9,500 years ago, after the Last Glacial Maximum.
Officially this is deepest stone age, and fits perfectly to the findings around the globe. Remnants of a mysterious past which is 10 000 years old, at least. Not hunters and catherers are able to build such known stone constructions and cities, but a socialized culture with a division of tasks. Moreover, its builders did not create it on site, but transported it to its location from a formation 300 meters away - an amazing feat for the time.
PlacePantelleria Vecchia Bank
Countrynull

points.description:
NameUnderwater structures Bimini Road
DescriptionArtificial underwater structures. As in Yonaguni, French Britany (Er Lanic) and Malta - the world sea level must have been rised after the constructions were built.

points.name: Underwater structures near Yonaguni
points.description:
NameUnderwater structures near Yonaguni
DescriptionIn 1987 divers found a gigantic clear-shaped structure under water in the pacific ocean. Did the constructors built it under water or did they before the global sea level rised? Around 10 000 years ago the sea levels rised 30-80 meters after the last ice age. We can find such underwater man made structures all around the world. For example the city of Dwarka, India or at Bimini Island, Bahamas.
PlaceYonaguni south-east coast
Countrynull

points.name: Vasagard
points.description:
NameVasagard
DescriptionThe langdysse Vasagård is situated in the southwest of Bornholm 2 km distant from Aakirkeby. It is a ritual place build by the Funnelbeaker culture with a megalithic grave (4.000 BC) and a passage grave (3.000 BC) which where connected during the Bronz Age (1.000 BC). This kind of combination is very rare and makes this site a special place where over thousands of years funerals have taken place. At that time period they had a different view of the relation between life and death. There was no eternal rest for the dead the bones where often rearrenged and cleaned, probably for ritual purposes. In midsummer you can see the southernmost full moon shining through the entrence of the passage grave. During excavations a lot of stones covered with motivs of the sun (sun stones) where found nearby. Was this place a sun worshiping site ? The langdysse Vasagård is a very unique and special place its history goes back 6.000 years. Today very little is known about it, many questions must be answered. We have to take care that these places will not be forgotten.
PlaceAakirkeby
CountryDenmark

points.name: Woodhenge Pömmelte Germany
points.description:
NameWoodhenge Pömmelte Germany
DescriptionThe Woodhenge of Pömmelte is from the late Neolithic or early Bronce-Age and is made of 1200 Locust-Tree-Logs. The site of the Ringheiligtum Pömmelte is on a tourist path called the Himmelsweg, which translated means path to heaven, a route in the Area that has sites where people probably observed the heavens and Stars in prehistoric times. The Woodhenge measures 115 meters (377.3 feet) in diameter and Skeletons of children and young women, who were possibly killed as human sacrifices, were excavated at the site.
PlacePömmelte
CountryGermany

points.name: Yangshan Quarry
points.description:
NameYangshan Quarry
DescriptionAt the Yangshan Quarry (Yanmen Shan mountain) near Nanjing, China there are the largest yet known man made megaliths on planet earth. History tells us that these megaliths were carved out of the bedrock in the 15th century during the time of the Yongle dynasty. The three parts should be moved and put together as a memorial stele. This project was abandoned for the megaliths being too heavy to move. The measurements of the three parts are: Stele Base 30,35 m long, 13 m thick, 16 m tall, 16.250 t weight! ( for comparison megalith Baalbek, Lebanon: 1.650 t weight)
Stele Body 49,4 m long, 10,7 m wide, 4,4 m thick, 8.788 t weight
Stele Head 10,7 m tall, 20,3 m wide, 8,4 m thick, 6.118 t weight.
This memorial stele would have been 73 m tall.
Did they really carved the stones, all three of them, and then they realized they could not move them? Or did these massive stones have some other purpose ? Interestingly there are the same lifting knobson the megaliths as in Peru, Bolivia, Egypt...
PlaceNanjing
CountryChina

points.name: Yazilikaya - Sanctuary
points.description:
NameYazilikaya - Sanctuary
DescriptionChiseled out of the bedrock from Yazılıkkaya, the pictures show winged beings in the skies, mixed creatures and lines of long helmeted humans. These hats, like the Tirara of the Pope today, have been the rulers headwear since unknown times. Does it have something to do with the elongated skulls, which where imitated to look like the Gods?
Why here and what if these messages talk of ancient technology and not psychological-perverted mythology?
PlaceYazılıkkaya
CountryTurkey

points.name: Zawyet el-Aryan
points.description:
NameZawyet el-Aryan
DescriptionThis structure is called the unfinished pyramid or Baka pyramid, assigned to the 3rd dynasty.. It is listed as pyramid number XIII in Karl Lepsius list of pyramids (1842). In 1904 Alessandro Barsanti made the first excavations at this side. He discovered a huge pit in the centre of a rectangular superstructure. This pit is most interesting, its dimensions being: 28 m long, 4,50 m wide and 19 m deep. The pit was filled with limestone blocks from a enclosure wall. During the excavation a staircase was found which leads to the bottom of the pit. Fife monolithic granit blocks surrounded by limestone blocks form the pavement of the great pit of Zawyet el-Aryan. A large oval tank is carved out of one granit block (sarcophagus). As Barsanti discovered the oval tank it was protected with lime and clay surrounded by limestone blocks which wrapped the tank as a kind of insulating building. The lid was plastered to the tank, inside was nothing except a 10 cm black band lining the side walls. There wasn´t just one layer of fine cut stones building up the floor there where four layers in total (up to 26 m depth). Why did they build such a massive floor of interlocking blocks like a complicated puzzle? Unfortunately Barsanti displaced a lot of stones and never put them back into place. Today the pit is nearly forgotten and a military area is built around this site. In the movie: The land of the Pharaohs 1955 is a short scene in which the pit is shown. Was it really an unfinished pyramid or did it had an another function such as astronomical or technical ?
PlaceZawyet el-Aryan
CountryEgypt
